GK16jgrasg1u:10: pāṣāṇād api pīyūṣaṃ syandate yasya līlayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:18: tathāpi kleśo me katham api gatārtho na bhavitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:19: timīndrāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ vidadhatu payodheḥ punar ime
GK16jgrasg1u:22: kāvyaṃ mayātra nihitaṃ na parasya kiṃcit/
GK16jgrasg1u:28: kiṃ ca kulāni kavīnāṃ nisargasamyañci rañjayatu//
GK16jgrasg1u:30: kavisahṛdayayor āvaśyakatayā guṇālaṃkārādibhir nirūpaṇīye tasmin viśeṣyatāvacchedakaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:31: taditarabhedabuddhau sādhanaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ tāvan nirūpyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:35: kāraṇāṃ ca tadavacchinne bhāvanāviśeṣaḥ punaḥpunar anusaṃdhānātmā/
GK16jgrasg1u:37: ” “dhanaṃ te dāsyāmi” iti vākyārthadhījanyasyāhlādasya na lokottaratvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:41: svaviśiṣṭajanakatāvacchedakārthapratipādakatāsaṃsargeṇā camatkāratvavattvam eva vā kāvyatvam iti phalitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:42: yat tu prāñcaḥ “adoṣau saguṇau sālaṃkārau śabdārthau kāvyam” ity āhuḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:51: yadi kāvyapadārthatayā parābhimate śabdārthayugale kāvyaśabdaśakteḥ pramāpakaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ kim api pramāṇāṃ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:55: prāg uktād vyavahārataḥ śabdaviśeṣe siddhyantīṃ śaktiṃ ko nāma nivārayitum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:56: etena vinigamanābhāvād ubhayatra śaktir iti pratyuktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:57: tadevaṃ śabdaviśeṣasyaiva kāvyapadārthatve siddhe tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
GK16jgrasg1u:61: yat tv āsvādodbodhakatvam eva kāvyatvaprayojakaṃ tacca śabde cārthe cāviśiṣṭam ity āhuḥ, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:63: kiṃ bahunā nāṭyāṅgānāṃ sarveṣām api prāyaśas tathātvena tatvāpāttir durvāraiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:64: etena rasodbodhasamarthasyaivātra lakṣyatvam ity api parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:68: eko na dvāv iti vyavahārasyeva ślokavākyaṃ na kāvyam iti vyavahārasyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:73: “uditaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vidhoḥ” iti kāvye dūtyabhisārikāvirahiṇyādisamudīrite 'bhisaraṇavidhiniṣedhajīvanābhāvādipareḥ “gato 'stam arkaḥ” ityādau cāvyāptyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:74: na cedam akāvyam iti śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:78: duṣṭa kāvyam iti vyavahārasya bādhakaṃ vinā lākṣaṇikatvāyogāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:79: na ca saṃyogābhāvavān vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogītivad aṃśabhedena/
GK16jgrasg1u:80: doṣarahitaṃ duṣṭam iti vyavahāre bādhakaṃ nāstīti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:82: na śākhāyām” iti pratīter ivedaṃ padyaṃ pūrvārdhe kāvyam uttarārdhe tu na kāvyam iti svarasavāhino viśvajanīnānubhavasya virahād avyāpyavṛttitāyā api tasyāyogāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:84: hārādivad upaskārakāṇām alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca śarīraghaṭakatvānupapatteś ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:85: yat tu “rasavad eva kāvyam” iti sāhityadarpaṇe nirṇītam, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:89: tathā ca jalapravāhaveganipatanotpatanabhramaṇāni kavibhir varṇitāni kapibālādivilasitāni ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:90: na ca tatrāpi yathākathaṃcit paramparayā rasasparśo 'sty eveti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:94: tasya ca kāraṇaṃ kavigatā kevalā pratibhā/
GK16jgrasg1u:96: tadgataṃ ca pratibhātvaṃ kāvyakāraṇatāvacchedakatayā siddho jātiviśeṣa upādhirūpaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:97: vākhaṇḍam/ tasyāś ca hetuḥ kvacid devatāmahāpuruṣaprasādādijanyam adṛṣṭam/
GK16jgrasg1u:100: bālādes tau vināpi kevalān mahāpuruṣaprasādād api pratibhotpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:101: na tatra tayor janmāntarīyayoḥ kalpanaṃ vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:103: loke hi balavatā pramāṇenāgamādinā sati kāraṇātānirṇāye paścād upasthitasya vyabhicārasya vāraṇāya janmāntarīyam anyathānupapattyā kāraṇaṃ dharmādharmādi
GK16jgrasg1u:104: anyathā tu vyabhicāropasthityā pūrvavṛttakāraṇatānirṇāye bhramatvapratipattir eva jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:105: nāpi kevalam adṛṣṭam eva kāraṇam ity api śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:106: kiyantaṃcit kālaṃ kāvyaṃ kartum aśaknuvataḥ katham api saṃjātayor vyutpattyabhyāsayoḥ pratibhāyāḥ prādurbhāvasya darśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:107: tatrāpy adṛṣṭasyāṅgīkāre prāg api tābhyāṃ tasyāḥ prasakteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:108: na ca tatra pratibhāyāḥ pratibandhakam adṛṣṭāntaraṃ kalpyam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:109: tādṛśāneka sthalagatādṛṣṭadvayakalpanāpekṣayā kḷptavyutpattyabhyāsayor eva pratibhāhetutvakalpane lāghavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:111: tādṛśādṛṣṭasya tādṛśavyutpattyabhyāsayoś ca pratibhāgataṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryatāvacchedakam,
GK16jgrasg1u:114: pratibhāgatavailakṣaṇyam eva vā vilakṣaṇakāvyaṃ pratīti nātrāpi saḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:115: na ca sator api vyutpatyabhyāsayor yatra na pratibhotpattis tatrānvayavyabhicāra iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:117: pāpaviśeṣasya tatra pratibandhakatvakalpanād vā na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:118: pratibandhakābhāvasya ca kāraṇatā samuditaśaktyāditrayahetutāvādinaḥ śaktimātrahetutāvādinaś cāviśiṣṭā/
GK16jgrasg1u:119: prativādinā mantrādibhiḥ kṛte katipayadivasavyāpini vākstambhe vihitānekaprabandhasyāpi kaveḥ kāvyānudayasya darśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:121: śabdārthau yatra guṇībhāvitātmānau kamapyartham abhivyaṅktas tad ādyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:124: aparāṅgavācyasiddhyaṅgavyaṅgyasyāpi camatkāritayā tadvāraṇāya guṇībhāvitātmānāv iti svāpekṣayā vyaṅgyaprādhānyābhiprāyakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:134: na ca yady ayaṃ śayitaḥ syāt tadāsyānanāmbujaṃ cumbeyam iti nāyikecchāyā eva vyaṅgayatvam atreti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:135: manorathān saphalīkartum asamarthetyanena manorathāḥ sarve 'syā hṛdi tiṣṭanti iti pratīteḥ svaśabdena manorathapadena sāmānyākāreṇa tādṛśecchāyā api nivedanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:136: na ca manorathapadena manorathatvākāreṇā sāmānyecchāyā abhidhāne 'pi cumbeyam iti viṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭecchātvena vyaṅgyatve kiṃ bādhakam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:138: na hi viśeṣākāreṇa vyaṅgyo 'pi sāmānyākāreṇābhihito 'rthaḥ sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtim utpādayitum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:139: katham api vācyavṛttyanāliṅgitasyaiva vyaṅgyasya camatkāritvenālaṃkārikaiḥ svīkārāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:140: cumbanecchāyā ratyanubhāvatayaiva sundaratvena tadavyañjane cumbāmīti śabdabalāc cumbanecchāvad acamatkāritvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:141: evaṃ trapāyā api na prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:143: na ca daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇaṃ vidheyam iti nānuvādyatāvacchedakatvaṃ tasyā iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:144: evam api nayanagatadaramīlanasya tatkāryatve 'pi daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇasya ratimātrakāryatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:145: trapāyā eva mukhyatvena vyaṅgyatve nirīkṣaṇokter anatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:146: vācyavṛttyā rater anubhāve nirīkṣaṇo trapāyā anubhāvasya daramīlanasyeva vyañjanayā tasyāṃ tasyā api guṇībhāvapratyayaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:148: gurumadhyagatā mayā natāṅgī nihatā nīrajakorakeṇa mandam/
GK16jgrasg1u:150: atra ghūrṇitāsīd ityanenāsamīkṣyakārin kimidam anucitaṃ kṛtavān asīty arthasamvalito 'marṣaś carvaṇāviśrāntidhāmatvāt prādhānyena vyajyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:153: “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ śvāsāsaṅga na yā sehe/
GK16jgrasg1u:154: samprati sā hṛdayagataṃ priyapāṇiṃ mandam ākṣipati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:155: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitaprabandhagatatvena pūrvasākāṅkṣam iti diṅmātreṇa vyākhyāyate
GK16jgrasg1u:156: --- yā navavadhūḥ palyaṅkaśayitā śvāsasyāsaṅgamātreṇāpi saṃkucad aṅgalatikābhūt sā
GK16jgrasg1u:157: samprati prasthānapūrvarajanyāṃ pravatsyatpatikā priyeṇa saśaṅkena samarpitaṃ hṛdi
GK16jgrasg1u:160: atra śanaiḥ svasthānaprāpaṇātmanā mandākṣepeṇa ratyākhyaḥ sthāyī saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:162: amum eva ca prabhedaṃ dhvanim āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:163: yat tu citramīmāṃsāyām appayyadīkṣitaiḥ “niḥśeṣacyutacandanam” iti padyaṃ dhvanyudāharaṇaprasaṅge
GK16jgrasg1u:166: snāne hi sarvatra candana cyutiḥ syāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:167: tava tu stanayos taṭa upari bhāga eva dṛśyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:169: tathā nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara ity atra tāmbūlagrahaṇavilambāt prācīnarāgasya kiṃcin mṛṣṭatety anyathāsiddhiparihārāya nirmṛṣṭarāga iti rāgasya niḥśeṣamṛṣṭatoktā/
GK16jgrasg1u:170: punaḥ snānasādhāraṇyavartanena saṃbhogacihnodghāṭanāyādhara iti viśiṣya grahaṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:173: “taṭādighaṭitā vākyārthāḥ snānavyāvṛttidvārā saṃbhogāṅgānām āśleṣacumbanādīnāṃ pratipādanena pradhānavyaṅgyavyañjane sāhāyakam ācaranti iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:176: tathā hi-- pañcamollāsaśeṣe “niḥśeṣetyādau gamakatayā yāni candanacyavanādīny upāttāni tāni kāraṇāntarato 'pi bhavanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:177: yataś cātraiva snānakāryatvenopāttānīti nopabhoga eva pratibaddhānīty anaikāntikāni iti kāvyaprakāśakṛtoktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:179: “bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mālido teṇa/
GK16jgrasg1u:181: ityādau liṅgajaliṅgijñānarūpeṇānumānena vyaktiṃ gatārthayato vyaktivivekakṛto mataṃ pratyācakṣāṇena vyabhicāritvenāsiddhatvena ca saṃdihyamānād api liṅgād vyañjanam abhyupagatam/
GK16jgrasg1u:183: evaṃ ca vyañjakānāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatāṃ prāmāṇikānāṃ granthaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatas tava granthasya virodhaḥ sphuṭaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:184: kiṃ ca yad idaṃ niḥśeṣetyādyavāntaravākyārthānāṃ vāpīsnānavyāvṛttidvāreṇa vyaṅgyāsādhāraṇyaṃ saṃpādyate tat kim artham iti pṛcchāmaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:188: maha mandabhāiṇīe keraṃ sahi tuha paribhavai//“
GK16jgrasg1u:189: ityādau sādhāraṇānām evaunnidryādīnāṃ vaktrādivaiśiṣṭyavaśād arthaviśeṣavyañjakatāyā abhyupagateḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:192: salilārdravasanakaraṇakaproñchanādināpi tatsambhavād iti cet tarhi vāpīsnānavyāvartanena kaḥ puruṣārthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:193: ekatrānaikāntikatvasyeva bahuṣv anaikāntikatāyā api jñātāyā anumitipratikūlatvād vyaktyapratikūlatvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:194: api cātra hi tadantikam eva rantuṃ gatāsīti vyaṅgyaśarīre tadantikagamanaṃ ramaṇarūpaphalāṃśaś ceti dvayaṃ ghaṭakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:195: tatra tāvat tadantikaṃ gatāsītyaṃśasya tvanmate vyaṅgyatvaṃ durupapādam/
GK16jgrasg1u:198: na gateti śabdābhyāṃ virodhilakṣaṇayā niṣedhasya vidheś ca pratīter upapatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:200: yathā “aho pūrṇaṃ saro yatra luṭhantaḥ snānti mānavāḥ” ityatra kartṛviśeṣaṇānupapattyadhīnollāse pūrṇatvābhāve/
GK16jgrasg1u:201: atha tadantikagamanasya lakṣaṇāvedyatve 'pi ramaṇasya phalāṃśasya lakṣyaśaktimūladhvananavedyatvam avyāhatam eveti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:202: “adhamatvam aprakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā vā bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:203: tatra jātyāpakarṣaṃ nottamanāyikā nāyakasya vākti” ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa bhavataivārthāpattivedyatāyāḥ sphuṭaṃ vacanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:205: anyac ca yathā kathaṃcid aṅgīkuru vātra vyañjanāvyāpāraṃ tathāpi na taveṣṭasiddhiḥ/ vācyānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:206: niḥśeṣacyutacandanastanataṭatvādīnām adhamatvasya ca tvaduktarītyā prakārāntareṇānupapadyamānatayā dūtīsaṃbhogamātraniṣpādyatvena guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaprasaṅgāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:209: tathā hi-- ayi bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame svārthaparāyaṇe snānakālātikramabhayavaśena nadīmadīyapriyayor antikam agatvaiva vāpīṃ snātum ito mamāntikād gatāsi,
GK16jgrasg1u:211: yato niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanayos taṭam eva noraḥsthalam,
GK16jgrasg1u:213: evaṃ tvarayā samyag akṣālanenottaroṣṭho na nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharas tu tadapekṣayā gaṇḍūṣajalaradanaśodhanāṅgulyādīnām adhikasaṃmardam āvahatīti
GK16jgrasg1u:214: kiṃ ca samyag akṣālanena netre jalamātrasaṃsagad dūram uparibhāga evānañjane/
GK16jgrasg1u:215: śītavaśāt tānavāc ca tava tanuḥ pulakiteti/
GK16jgrasg1u:218: evaṃ sādhāraṇoṣv eṣu vākyārtheṣu mukhyārthe bādhābhāvāt tātparyārthasya jhaṭity anākalanāt kuto 'tra lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:219: anantaraṃ ca vācyārthapratipatter vaktṛboddhavyanāyakādīnāṃ vaiśiṣṭyasya pratītau
GK16jgrasg1u:220: satyām adhamapadena svapravṛttiprayojako duḥkhadātṛtvarūpo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇātmā vācyārthadaśayām
GK16jgrasg1u:223: etena “adhamatvam apakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā vā bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:227: soḍham eveti nodghāṭanārham itītaravyāvṛtyā saṃbhogarūpam eva paryavasyati” iti yad uktam,
GK16jgrasg1u:230: prakāśayitum atitamām anaucityena prācīnānām eva soḍhānām apy aparādhānām asahyatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:232: yatra vyaṅgyam apradhānam eva saccamatkārakāraṇaṃ tad dvitīyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:233: vācyāpekṣayā pradhānībhūtaṃ vyaṅgyāntaram ādaya guṇībhūtaṃ vyaṅgyam ādāyātivyāptivāraṇāyāvadhāraṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:236: yat tu “atādṛśi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyam” ityādi kāvyaprakāśagatalakṣaṇe citrānyatvaṃ ṭīkākārair dattam, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:241: śiśire sukhaṃ śayānāḥ kapayaḥ kupyanti pavanatanayāya//“
GK16jgrasg1u:242: atra jānakīkuśalāvedanena rāghavaḥ śiśirīkṛta iti vyaṅgyam ākasmikakapikartṛkahanumadviṣayakakopopapādakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:243: guṇībhūtam api durdāivavaśato dāsyam anubhavad rājakalatram iva kām api kamanīyatām āvahati /
GK16jgrasg1u:244: nanv evaṃ prāg uktam ākṣepagataṃ māndyam api navavadhūprakṛtivirodhād anupapadyamānaṃ vyaṅgyenaivopapādyata iti katham uttamottamatā tasya kāvyasyeti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:245: yato hy anudinasakhyupadeśādibhir anaticamatkāribhir apy upapadyamānaṃ māndyam idaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:246: prathamacittacumbinīṃ vipralambharatim aprakāśayan na prabhavati svātantryeṇa paranirvṛticarvaṇāgocaratām ādhātum/
GK16jgrasg1u:247: ittham eva niḥśeṣacyutacandanam ityādipadyeṣv adhamatvādīni vācyāni vyaṅgyātiriktenārthenāpātato niṣpannaśarīrāṇi vyañjakānīti na tatrāpi guṇībhāvaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:248: anayor bhedayor anapahnavanīyacamatkārayor api prādhānyāprādhānyābhyām asti kaścit sahṛdayavedyo viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:251: kim uta sakale yāte vāhni priya tvam ihaiṣyasi/
GK16jgrasg1u:254: ity atra sakalam ahaḥ paramāvadhis tataḥ paraṃ prāṇāndhārayituṃ na śaknomīti vyaṅgyaṃ priyagamananivāraṇarūpavācyasiddhyaṅgam ato guṇībhūtavyaṅgyam”
GK16jgrasg1u:256: sa bāṣpagalajjalānāṃ praharaviratāv ityādyālāpānām eva priyagamananivāraṇarūpavācyasiddhyaṅgatayā vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvābhāvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:257: ālāpair iti tṛtīyayā prakṛtyarthasya haraṇakriyākaraṇatāyāḥ sphuṭaṃ pratipatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:258: na ca vyaṅgyasyāpi vācyasiddhyaṅgatātra saṃbhavatīti tathoktam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:259: niḥśeṣacyutacandam ityādāv ivādhamatvarūpavācyasiddhyaṅgyatāyā dūtīsaṃbhogādau saṃbhavād guṇībhāvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:260: astu vā tataḥ paraṃ prāṇān dhārayituṃ na śaknomīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:261: guṇībhāvas tathāpi nāyakāder vibhāvasya bāṣpāder anubhāvasya cittāvegādeś ca saṃcāriṇaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:262: saṃyogād abhivyajyamānena vipralambhena dhvanitvaṃ ko nivārayet /
GK16jgrasg1u:267: śvaityapātālatalacumbitvādīnāṃ camatkāro leśatayā sann apy utprekṣācamatkṛtijaṭharanilīno nāgariketaranāyikākalpitakāśmīradravāṅgarāgani gīrṇo nijāṅgagaurim eva pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:268: na tādṛśo 'sti ko 'pi vācyārtho yo manāg anāmṛṣṭapratīyamāna eva svato ramaṇīyatām ādhātuṃ prabhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:269: anayor eva dvitīyatṛtīyabhedayor jāgarūkājāgarūkaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ praviṣṭaṃ nikhilam alaṃkārapradhānaṃ kāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:270: yatrārthacamatkṛtyupaskṛtā śabdacamatkṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ tad adhamaṃ caturtham// yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:272: gotrārigotrajatrāya gotrātre te namo namaḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:274: yady api yatrārthacamatkṛtisāmānyaśūnyā śabdacamatkṛtis tatpañcamam adhamādhamam api kāvyavidhāsu gaṇayitum ucitam,
GK16jgrasg1u:277: kāvyatvābhāvena mahākavibhiḥ pracīnaparamparām anurundhānais tatra tatra kāvyeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:280: kecid imān api caturo bhedān agaṇayanta uttamamadhyamādhamabhāvena trividham eva kāvyam ācakṣate/
GK16jgrasg1u:283: ko hy evaṃ sahṛdayaḥ san “vinirgataṃ mānadam ātmamandirāt“,
GK16jgrasg1u:284: “sa cchinnamūlaḥ kṣatajena reṇuḥ” ityādibhiḥ kāvyaiḥ “svacchandocchalad” ityādīnāṃ pāmaraślāghyānām aviśeṣaṃ brūyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:285: saty api tāratamye yady ekabhedatvaṃ kas tarhi dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyor īṣadantarayor vibhinnabhedatve durāgrahaḥ/ yatra ca
GK16jgrasg1u:286: śabdārthacamatkṛtyor aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tatra tayor guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ paryālocya yathālakṣaṇaṃ vyavahartavyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:292: saṃghātaḥ ko 'pi dhāmnām ayam udayagiriprāntataḥ prādurāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:294: prasādaguṇayogād anantaram evādhigatasya rūpakasya hetvalaṃkārasya vā vācyasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:296: tatra dhvaner uttamottamasyāsaṃkhyabhedasyāpi sāmānyataḥ ke 'pi bhedā nirūpyante-- dvividho dhvaniḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:303: evaṃ pañcātmake dhvanau paramaramaṇīyatayā rasadhvanes tadātmā rasas tāvad abhidhīyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:304: samucitalalitasaṃniveśacāruṇā kāvyena samarpitaiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayaṃ praviṣṭais tadīyasahṛdayatāsahakṛtena
GK16jgrasg1u:309: cintādibhiḥ sahakāribhiś ca saṃbhūya prādurbhāvitenālaukikena vyāpāreṇa tatkālanivartitānandāṃśāvaraṇājñānenāta
GK16jgrasg1u:310: eva pramuṣṭaparimitapramātṛtvādinijadharmeṇa pramātrā svaprakāśatayā vāstavena nijasvarūpānandena
GK16jgrasg1u:311: saha gocarīkriyamāṇaḥ pragviniviṣṭavāsanārūpo ratyādir eva rasaḥ //
GK16jgrasg1u:316: yathā hi śarāvādinā pihito dīpas tannivṛttau saṃnihitān padārthān prakāśayati svayaṃ ca prakāśate,
GK16jgrasg1u:319: vibhāvādīnām api svapnaturagādīnām iva raṅgarajatādīnām iva sākṣibhāsyatvam aviruddham/
GK16jgrasg1u:320: vyañjakavibhāvādicarvaṇāyā āvaraṇabhaṅgasya votpattivināśābhyām utpattivināśau rase upacaryete varṇanityatāyām iva vyañjakatālvādivyāpārasya
GK16jgrasg1u:322: nivṛttāyāṃ tasyāṃ prakāśasyāvṛtatvād vidyamāno 'pi sthāyī na prakāśate/
GK16jgrasg1u:323: yad vā vibhāvādicarvaṇāmāhimnā sahṛdayasya nijasahṛdayatāvaśonmiṣitena tattatsthāyyupahitasvasvarūpānandākārā samādhāv iva yoginaś cittavṛttir
GK16jgrasg1u:327: itthaṃ cābhinavaguptamammaṭabhaṭṭādigranthasvārasyena bhagnāvaraṇacidviśiṣṭo ratyādiḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasa iti sthitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:328: vastutas tu vakṣyamāṇaśrutisvārasyena ratyādyavacchinna bhagnāvaraṇā cid eva rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:329: sarvathaiva cāsyā viśiṣṭātmano viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā cidaṃśam ādāya nityatvaṃ svaprakāśatvaṃ ca siddham/
GK16jgrasg1u:330: ratyādyaṃśam ādāya tv anityatvam itarabhāsyatvaṃ ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:336: athāsyāṃ sukhāṃśabhāne kiṃ mānam iti cet samādhāv api tadbhāne kiṃ mānam iti paryanuyogasya tulyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:338: ityādiḥ śabdo 'sti tatra mānam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:340: rasaṃ hy evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati” iti śrutiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:343: yeyaṃ dvitīyapakṣe tadākāracittavṛttyātmikā rasacarvaṇopanyastā sā śabdavyāpārabhāvyatvāc chābdī/
GK16jgrasg1u:356: svātmani duṣyantādyabhedabuddhir eva tatheti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:357: nāyake dharādhaureyatvadhīratvāder ātmani cādhunikatvakāpuruṣatvāder vāidharmyasya sphuṭaṃ pratipatter abhedabodhasyaiva durlabhatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:362: cintopanītānāṃ teṣām eva padārthānāṃ mānasyāḥ pratīter asyā vailakṣaṇyopalambhāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:368: tṛtīyasya bhogakṛttvavyāpārasya mahimnā nigīrṇayo rajastamasor udriktasattvajanitena nijacitsvabhāvanirvṛtiviśrāntilakṣaṇena
GK16jgrasg1u:369: sākṣātkāreṇa viṣayīkṛto bhāvanopanītaḥ sādhāraṇātmā ratyādiḥ sthāyī rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:373: evaṃ ca trayo 'mśāḥ kāvyasya-- “abhidhā bhāvanā caiva tadbhogīkṛtir eva ca” ity āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:374: matasyaitasya pūrvasmān matād bhāvakatvavyāpārāntarasvīkāra eva viśeṣa/
GK16jgrasg1u:378: (3) navyās tu “kāvye nāṭye ca kavinā naṭena ca prakāśiteṣu vibhāvādiṣu vyañjanavyāpāreṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:379: duṣyantādau śakuntalādiratau gṛhītāyām anantaraṃ ca sahṛdayatollāsitasya bhāvanāviśeṣarūpasya
GK16jgrasg1u:380: doṣasya mahimnā kalpitaduṣyantatvāvacchādite svātmany ajñānāvacchinne śuktikāśakala
GK16jgrasg1u:381: iva rajatakhaṇḍaḥ samutpadyamāno 'nirvacanīyaḥ sākṣibhāsyaḥ śakuntalādiviṣayakaratyādir eva rasaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:385: svapūrvopasthitena ratyādinā tadagrahāt tadratitvenaikatvādhyavasānād vā vyaṅgyo varṇanīyaś cocyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:388: etena duṣyantādiniṣṭhasya ratyāder anāsvādyatvān na rasatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:389: svaniṣṭhasya tu tasya śakuntalādibhir atatsaṃbandhibhiḥ katham abhivyaktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:391: yad api vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ prācīnair uktaṃ tad api kāvyena śakuntalādiśabdaiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:392: śakuntalātvādiprakārakabodhajanakaiḥ pratipādyamāneṣu śakuntalādiṣu doṣaviśeṣakalpanaṃ vinā durupapādam /
GK16jgrasg1u:393: ato 'vaśyakalpye doṣaviśeṣe tenaiva svātmani duṣyantādyabhedabuddhir api sūpapādā/
GK16jgrasg1u:394: nanv evam api rater astu nāma duṣyanta iva sahṛdaye 'pi sukhaviśeṣajanakatā karuṇarasādiṣu tu sthāyinaḥ śokāder duḥkhajanakatayā prasiddhasya katham iva
GK16jgrasg1u:397: na ca satyasya śokāder duḥkhajanakatvaṃ kḷptaṃ na kalpitasyeti nāyakānām eva duḥkham,
GK16jgrasg1u:400: sahṛdaye rater api kalpitatvena sukhajanakatānupapatteś ceti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:402: śṛṅgārapradhānakāvyebhya iva karuṇapradhānakāvyebhyo 'pi yadi kevalāhlāda eva sahṛdayahṛdayapramāṇakas
GK16jgrasg1u:405: atha yady āhlāda iva duḥkham api pramāṇasiddhaṃ tadā pratibandhakatvaṃ na kalpanīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:412: iṣṭasyādhikyād aniṣṭasya ca nyūnatvāc candanadravalepanādāv iva pravṛtter upapatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:416: ata eva bhagavadbhaktānāṃ bhagavadvarṇanākarṇanād aśrupātādaya upapadyante/
GK16jgrasg1u:418: na ca karuṇarasādau svātmani śokādimaddaśarathāditādātmyārope yady āhlādas tadā svapnādau saṃnipātādau vā svātmani tadārope 'pi sa syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:420: itīhāpi tad eva yuktam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:422: yatprayojyā aramaṇīyā api śokādayaḥ padārthā āhlādam alaukikaṃ janayanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:423: vilakṣaṇo hi kamanīyaḥ kāvyavyāpāraja āsvādaḥ pramāṇāntarajād anubhavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:426: śakuntalādāv agamyātvajñānotpādas tu svātmani duṣyantādyabhedabuddhyā pratibadhyate” ity āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:428: cānabhyupagame 'pi prāguktadoṣamahimnā svātmani duṣyantāditādātmyāvagāhī śakuntalādiviṣayakaratyādimadabhedabodho mānasaḥ vilakṣaṇaviṣayitāśālī
GK16jgrasg1u:429: svāpnādis tu tādṛśabodho na kāvyārthacintanajanmeti na rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:431: evam api svasminn avidyamānasya ratyāder anubhavaḥ kathaṃ nāma syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:436: āsvādanasya rasaviṣayakatvavyavahāras tu ratyādiviṣayakatvālambanaḥ” ity api vadanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:441: tatra “rater viśeṣaṇībhūtāyāḥ śabdād apratītatvād vyañjanāyāś ca tatpratyāyikāyā anabhyupagamāc ceṣṭādiliṅgakam ādau viśeṣaṇajñānārtham anumānam
GK16jgrasg1u:442: (5) “mukhyatayā duṣyantādigata eva raso ratyādiḥ kamanīyavibhāvādyabhinayapradarśanakovide duṣyantādyanukartari naṭe samāropya sākṣātkriyate” ity eke/
GK16jgrasg1u:443: mate 'smin sākṣātkāro duṣyanto 'yaṃ śakuntalādiviṣayakaratimān” ityādiḥ prāgvad dharmyaṃśe laukika āropyāṃśe tv alaukikaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:444: (6) duṣyantādigato ratyādir naṭe pakṣe duṣyantatvena gṛhīte vibhāvādibhiḥ kṛtrimair
GK16jgrasg1u:445: apy akṛtrimatayā gṛhītair bhinne viṣaye 'numitisāmagryā balavattvād anumīyamāno rasaḥ” ity apare /
GK16jgrasg1u:447: (8) “triṣu ya eva camatkārī sa eva raso 'nyathā tu trayo 'pi na” iti bahavaḥ/ (9)
GK16jgrasg1u:450: (11) “tathā vyabhicāry eva tathā pariṇamati” iti kecit/
GK16jgrasg1u:453: sthāyyupahitacidānandātmano vā niṣpattiḥ svarūpeṇa prakāśanam” ity ādye /
GK16jgrasg1u:457: “vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇāṃ saṃyogād bhāvanāviśeṣarūpād doṣād rasasyānirvacanīyaduṣyantaratyādyātmano niṣpattir utpattiḥ” iti tṛtīye/
GK16jgrasg1u:458: “vibhāvādīnāṃ saṃyogāj jñānād rasasya jñānaviśeṣātmano niṣpattir utpattiḥ” iti caturthe/
GK16jgrasg1u:459: vibhāvādīnāṃ saṃbandhād rasasya ratyāder niṣpattir āropaḥ iti pañcame/
GK16jgrasg1u:460: vibhāvādibhiḥ kṛtrimair apy akṛtrimatayā gṛhītaiḥ saṃyogād anumānād rasasya ratyāder niṣpattir anumitir naṭādau pakṣa iti śeṣaḥ” iti ṣaṣṭhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:461: “vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyogāt samudāyād rasaniṣpattī rasapadavyavahāraḥ” iti saptame/
GK16jgrasg1u:463: tad evaṃ paryavasitas triṣu mateṣu sūtravirodhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:464: vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇām ekasya tu rasāntarasādhāraṇatayā niyatarasavyañjakatānupapatteḥ sūtre militānām upādānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:465: evaṃ ca prāmāṇike militānāṃ vyañjakatve yatra kvacid ekasmād evāsādhāraṇād rasodbodhas tatretaradvayam ākṣepyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:468: śemuṣībhir nānārūpatayāvasito 'pi manīṣibhiḥ paramāhlādāvinābhāvitayā pratīyamānaḥ prapañce 'smin raso ramaṇīyatām āvahatīti nirvivādam/
GK16jgrasg1u:471: hāsyo bhayānakaś caiva bībhatsaś ceti te nava//“
GK16jgrasg1u:476: aṣṭāv eva rasā nāṭye na śāntas tatra yujyate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:477: ity āhuḥ/ tac cāpare na kṣamante/
GK16jgrasg1u:478: tathā hi-- naṭe śamābhāvād iti hetur asaṃgataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:481: na ca naṭasya śamābhāvāt tadabhinayaprakāśakatvānupapattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:482: tasya bhayakrodhāder apy abhāvena tadabhinayaprakāśakatāyā apy asaṃgatyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:483: yadi ca naṭasya krodhāder abhāvena vāstavatatkāryāṇāṃ vadhabandhādīnām utpattyasaṃbhave 'pi kṛtrimatatkāryāṇāṃ śikṣābhyāsādita utpattau nāsti bādhakam iti nirīkṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:485: atha nāṭye gītavādyādīnāṃ virodhināṃ sattvāt sāmājikeṣv api viṣayavaimukhyātmanaḥ śāntasya katham udreka iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:486: nāṭye śāntarasam abhyupagacchadbhiḥ phalabalāt tadgītavādyādes tasmin virodhitāyā akalpanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:487: viṣayacintāsāmānyasya tatra virodhitvasvīkāre tadīyālambanasya saṃsārānītyatvasya taduddīpanasya purāṇaśravaṇasatsaṅgapuṇyavanatīrthāvalokanāder api viṣayatvena virodhitvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:489: “aṣṭāv eva rasā nāṭyeṣv iti kecid acūcudan/
GK16jgrasg1u:490: tadacāru yataḥ kaṃcin na rasaṃ svadate naṭaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:492: yair api nāṭye śānto raso nāstīty abhyupagamyate tair api bādhakābhāvān mahābhāratādiprabandhānāṃ śāntarasapradhānatayā akhilalokānubhavasiddhatvāc ca kāvye so 'vaśyaṃ svīkāryaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:493: atra eva “aṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ” ity upakramya “śānto 'pi navamo rasaḥ” iti mammaṭabhaṭṭā apy upasamahārṣuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:496: hāso bhayaṃ jugupsā ca sthāyibhāvāḥ kramād amī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:497: rasebhyaḥ sthāyibhāvānāṃ ghaṭāder ghaṭādyavacchinnākāśād iva prathamadvitīyayor matayoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:501: tatra ā prabandhaṃ sthiratvād amīṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:503: na ca cittavṛttirūpāṇām eṣām āśuvināśitvena sthiratvaṃ durlabham,
GK16jgrasg1u:504: vāsanārūpatayā sthiratvaṃ tu vyabhicāriṣv atiprasaktam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:505: vāsanārūpāṇām amīṣāṃ muhurmuhur abhivyakter eva sthirapadārthatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:509: “virūddhair aviruddhair vā bhāvair vicchidyate na yaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:512: rasatvaṃ ye prapadyante prasiddhāḥ sthāyino 'tra te//“
GK16jgrasg1u:518: yāvad rasaṃ vartamānaḥ sthāyibhāva udāhṛtaḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:525: stokaṃ vibhāvair utpannās ta eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:530: yadā tu pradhānaparipoṣārthaṃ so 'pi bahuvibhāvajaḥ kriyate tadā tu rasālaṃkāra ityādi bodhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:532: strīpuṃsayor anyonyālambanaḥ premākhyaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo ratiḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:535: strīpuṃsayos tu viyoge jīvitatvajñānadaśāyāṃ vaiklavyapoṣitāyā rater eva prādhānyāc chṛṅgāro vipralambhākhyo rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:537: mṛtatvajñānadaśāyāṃ tu ratipoṣitasya vaiklavyasyeti karuṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:538: yadā tu saty api mṛtatvajñāne devatāprasādādinā punar ujjīvanajñānaṃ kathaṃcit syāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:542: kecit tu rasāntaram evātra karuṇavipralambhākhyam icchanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:553: paramānarthaviṣayakatvābhāve tu sa eva trāso vyabhicāri/
GK16jgrasg1u:555: svāparādhadvārotthaṃ bhayam iti bhayatrāsayor bhedam āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:557: evam eṣāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ loke tattannāyakagatānāṃ yānyālambanatayoddīpanatayā vā kāraṇatvena prasiddhāni tāny eṣu kāvyanāṭyayor vyajyamāneṣu vibhāvaśabdena vyapadiśyante//
GK16jgrasg1u:578: evaṃ yasyāś cittavṛtter yo viṣayaḥ sa tasyā ālambanam/
GK16jgrasg1u:590: tatrādyo yathā “śayitā savidhe 'pyanīśvarā” ity atra nirūpitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:595: na hi guṇībhūtasya ratyāde rasadhvanivyapadeśahetutvaṃ yuktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:601: bālā lolavilocanā śiva śiva prāṇeśam ālokate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:609: śvāso dīrghas tadavādhi mukhe pāṇḍimā gaṇḍayugme
GK16jgrasg1u:613: āliṅgitāpi joṣaṃ tasthau sā gantukena dayitena//“
GK16jgrasg1u:615: imaṃ ca pañcavidhaṃ prāñcaḥ pravāsādibhir upādhibhir āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:616: te ca pravāsābhilāṣaviraherṣyāśāpānāṃ viśeṣānupalambhān nāsmābhiḥ prapañcitāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:619: hā tanaya vinayaśālin katham iva paralokapathiko 'bhūḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:626: śvapanātmabhuvor nirantarā mama jātā paramātmani sthitiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:630: yady api prathamārdhe uttamādhamayor upakramā dvitīyārdhe 'dhamottamavacanaṃ kramabhaṅgam āvahati,
GK16jgrasg1u:631: tathāpi vaktur brahmātmakatayottamādhamajñānavaikalyaṃ saṃpannam iti dyotanāya kramabhaṅgo guṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:637: atrāpi yady api viṣayagaṇālambanaḥ surasrotasvinītaṭādyuddīpito nayananimīlanādibhir anubhāvitaḥ sthāyi nirvedaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:638: bhagavadvāsudevālambanāyāṃ kaviratau guṇībhūta iti na śāntarasadhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:639: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitāyāṃ bhagavadbhaktipradhānāyāṃ karuṇālaharyām upanibaddham iti tatpradhānabhāvaprādhānyam evārhati/
GK16jgrasg1u:640: śāntarasānanuguṇaś cāyam ojasvī gumpha iti cānudāhāryam evaitat/
GK16jgrasg1u:641: pūrvapadye tu “paramātmani sthitiḥ” ity anena tattādrūpyāvagamād rater apratipattiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:655: vṛttir apy atra mahoddhatā raudrasya paramaujasvitāṃ paripuṣṇāti/
GK16jgrasg1u:656: anyatra gurusmaraṇe saty ahaṃbhāvavigamasyāvaśyakatayā prakṛte cājahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūladhvananena
GK16jgrasg1u:657: madīyety anena garvotkarṣasyaiva prakāśanāt sphuṭaṃ gamyamānena vivekaśunyatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:667: tathāpy asau tatprabhāvavarṇanabījabhūtāyāṃ kaviratau guṇībhūta iti na raudrarasadhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:668: kāvyaprakāśagataraudrarasodāharaṇe tu “kṛtam anumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yair idaṃ gurupātakam” iti padye raudrarasavyajanakṣamā nāsti vṛttiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:677: eṣā dvijaveṣāyendrāya kavacakuṇḍaladānodyatasya karṇasya taddānavismitān sabhyān pratyuktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:681: me ity arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyadhvanyutthāpito garvaḥ svakīyalokottarapitṛjanyatvādismṛtiś ca saṃcāriṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:683: tathā hi--utsāhapoṣakaṃ kavacakuṇḍalārpaṇayor laghutvanirūpaṇaṃ vidhātuṃ pūrvārdhe tadanukūlaśithilabandhātmikā/
GK16jgrasg1u:685: tataḥ paraṃ brāhmaṇe savinayatvaṃ prakāśayituṃ tanmūlībhūtaṃ garvarāhityaṃ dhvanayituṃ punaḥ śithilaiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:695: asūyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ paripoṣito 'pi kāmagavīgata utsāho rājastutiguṇībhūta iti na rasavyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:698: sarvāṃ dyām api susmitena hariṇā mandaṃ samālokitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:705: prāg anyagatasyeva prakṛte rājagatasyāpi tasya rājastutyutkarṣakatvāt/ etena
GK16jgrasg1u:708: nanu “akaruṇam avakṛtya-” ity atrāpi pratīyamānasya dānavīrasya karṇastutyaṅgatvāt kathaṃ dhvanitvam iti cet, satyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:711: karṇasya ca mahāśayatvenātmastutau tātparyānupapatteḥ stutir avākyārtha eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:712: paraṃ tu vīrarasapratyayānantaraṃ tādṛśotsāhena liṅgena svādhikaraṇe sānumīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:713: rājavarṇanapadye tu rājastutau tātparyād vākyārthataiva tasyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:715: “na kapota bhavantam aṇv api spṛśatu śyena samudbhavaṃ bhayam/
GK16jgrasg1u:716: idam adya mayā tṛṇīkṛtaṃ bhavadāyuḥkuśalaṃ kalevaram//“
GK16jgrasg1u:718: “na kapotakapotakaṃ tava spṛśatu śyena manāg api spṛhā/
GK16jgrasg1u:719: idam adya mayā samarpitaṃ bhavate cārutaraṃ kalevaram//“
GK16jgrasg1u:720: eṣā śiveḥ kapotaṃ śyenaṃ prati coktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:724: na cātra śarīradānapratyayād dānavīradhvanitvāpattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:729: prabhāvaprāgalbhyaṃ tvayi tu mama ko 'yaṃ parikaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:737: vṛttir atra devānāṃ prastāve tadgatakātaryaprakāśanadvārā vīrarasānālambanatvāvagataye 'nuddhataiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:739: tasyāvajñayā rāmagatotsāhānālambanatvena tadālambanasya rasasyāpratyayān na prakarṣavatī/
GK16jgrasg1u:740: bhagavato bhavasya tu paramottamālambanavibhāvatvāt tatprastāve tadālambanasyaujasvino vīrarasasya niṣpatteḥ prakṛṣṭoddhatā/
GK16jgrasg1u:742: “sapadi vilayam etu rājyalakṣmīr upari patantv athavā kṛpāṇadhārāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:743: apaharatutarāṃ śiraḥ kṛtānto mama tu matir na manāg apaiti dharmāt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:744: eṣādharmeṇāpi ripur jetavya iti vadantaṃ prati yudhiṣṭhirasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:746: “na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād dharmaṃ tyajej jīvītasyāpi hetoḥ” ity ādivākyālocanam uddīpanam/
GK16jgrasg1u:749: itthaṃ vīrarasasya cāturvidhyaṃ prapañcitaṃ prācām anurodhāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:750: vastutas tu bahavo vīrarasasya śṛṅgārasyeva prakārā nirūpayituṃ śakyante/
GK16jgrasg1u:751: tathā hi--prācīna eva “sapadi vilayam etu” ityādi padye “mama tu matir na manāg apaiti satyāt” iti caramapādavyatyāsena padyāntaratāṃ prāpite satyavīrasyāpi saṃbhavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:752: na ca satyasyāpi dharmāntargatatayā dharmavīrarasa eva tadvīrasyāpy antarbhāva iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:753: dānadayayor api tadantargatatayā tadvīrayor api dharmavīrāt pṛthaggaṇanānaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:756: “api vakti girāṃ patiḥ svayaṃ yadi tāsām adhidevatāpi vā/
GK16jgrasg1u:758: atra bṛhaspatyādyālambanaḥ sabhādidarśanoddīpito nikhilavidvattiraskārānubhāvito garveṇa saṃcāriṇā poṣita utsāho vaktuḥ pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:763: api bahaladahanajālaṃ mūrdhni ripur me nirantaraṃ dhamatu/
GK16jgrasg1u:764: pātayatu vāsidhārām aham aṇumātraṃ na kiṃcid ābhāṣe//“
GK16jgrasg1u:768: “pariharatu dharāṃ phaṇipravīraḥ sukhamayatāṃ kamaṭho 'pi tāṃ vihāya/“
GK16jgrasg1u:769: aham iha puruhūta pakṣakoṇe nikhilam idaṃ jagad aklamaṃ vahāmi//
GK16jgrasg1u:771: nanu “api vakti-“pariharatu dharām-” iti padyadvaye garva eva notsāhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:772: madhyasthapadye tu dhṛtir eva dhvanyate iti bhāvadhvanaya evaite na rasadhvanaya iti cet tarhi yuddhavīrādiṣv api garvādidhvanitām eva kiṃ na
GK16jgrasg1u:773: rasadhvanisāmānyam eva vā kiṃ na tadvyabhicāradhvananena gatārthayeḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:780: kadācid bhagavato vāsudevasya vadanam ālokitavatyā yaśodāyā iyam uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:788: pratītāyāṃ vā tasyāṃ vismayasya guṇatvaṃ na yujyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:789: evaṃ kaścin mahāpuruṣo 'yam iti bhaktir api tasyāḥ mamāyaṃ bāla iti niścayena pratibandhād utpattam eva neṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:790: atas tasyām api vismayasya guṇībhāvo na śaṅkyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:795: lokottaraṃ dhairyam aho prabhāvaḥ kāpy ākṛtir nūtana eṣa sargaḥ// iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:796: tatredaṃ vaktavyam-- pratīyatāṃ nāmātra vismayaḥ paraṃ tv asau kathaṃkāraṃ adbhutarasa] dhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:798: yathā mahābhārate gītāsu viśvarūpaṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ pārthasya “paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān” ity ādau vākyasaṃdarbhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:800: bhaktir naivātra pratīyata iti ced daramukulitalocanaṃ vidāṃkurvantu sahṛdayāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:803: aṅgaṃ gavāṃ pūrvam aho pavitraṃ na vā kathaṃ rāsabhadharmapatnyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:812: uttamānāṃ madhyamānāṃ nīcānām apy asau bhavet/
GK16jgrasg1u:813: tryavasthaḥ kathitas tasya ṣaḍbhedāḥ santi cāpare//
GK16jgrasg1u:814: smitaṃ ca hasitaṃ proktam uttame puruṣe budhaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:822: ākuñcitākṣi mandraṃ ca vidur vihasitaṃ budhāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:831: kampamānatanur ākulekṣaṇāḥ spandituṃ na hi śaśāka lāvakaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:843: nanu ratikrodhotsāhabhayaśokavismayanirvedeṣu prāg udāhṛteṣu yathālambanāśrayayoḥ saṃpratyayaḥ na tathā hāse jugupsāyāṃ ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:845: padyaśrotuś ca rasāsvādādhikaraṇatvena laukikahāsajugupsāśrayatvānupapatter iti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:848: tadanākṣepe tu śrotuḥ svīyakāntāvarṇanapadyād iva rasodbodhe bādhakābhāvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:850: eṣāṃ prādhānye dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam guṇībhāve tu rasālaṃkāratvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:851: kecit tu “prādhānya evaiṣāṃ rasatvam anyathālaṃkāratvam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:856: ete cāsaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyāḥ sahṛdayena rasavyaktau jhagiti jāyamānāyāṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārivimarśakramasya sato 'pi sūcīśatapattraśatavedhakramasyevālakṣaṇāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:860: bhagavadālambanasya romāñcāśrupātādibhir anubhāvitasya harṣādibhiḥ paripoṣitasya bhāgavatādipurāṇaśravaṇasamaye bhagavadbhaktair
GK16jgrasg1u:869: na ca tarhi kāminīviṣayāyā api rater bhāvatvam astu,
GK16jgrasg1u:872: kāminyādiratīnāṃ ca bhāvatvam vinigamakābhāvāt, iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:874: anyathā putrādiviṣayāyā api rateḥ sthāyibhāvatvaṃ kuto na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:875: na syād vā kutaḥ śuddhabhāvatvaṃ jugupsāśokādīnām ity akhiladarśanaṃ vyākulī syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:888: atra kavinā prakṛtarasaṃ paripoṣṭukāmena tadabhivyañjake kāvye tadviruddharasāṅgānāṃ nibandhanaṃ na kāryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:889: yathā hi sati tadabhivyaktau viruddhaḥ prakṛtaṃ bādheta/
GK16jgrasg1u:891: yadi tu viruddhayor api rasayor ekatra samāveśa iṣyate tadā virodhaṃ parihṛtya vidheyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:897: yathā nāyakagatatvena vīrarase varṇanīye pratināyake bhayānakasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:905: yathā mannirmitāyām ākhyāyikāyāṃ kaṇvāśramagatasya śvetaketor maharṣeḥ śāntarasapradhāne varṇane prastute “kim idam anākalitapūrvaṃ rūpam,
GK16jgrasg1u:906: ko 'yam anirvācyo vacanaracanāyā madhurimā” ity adbhutasyāntaravasthāpanena varavarṇinīṃ pratyanurāgavarṇane/
GK16jgrasg1u:910: atra surāṅganāmṛtaśarīrālambanayoḥ śṛṅgārabībhatsayor antaḥ svargalābhākṣipto vīraraso niveśitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:912: tac ca prakṛtapadye prathamārdha eva śṛṅgāracarvaṇottaraṃ vīrasya carvaṇād anantaraṃ ca dvitīyārdhe bībhatsasyeti sphuṭam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:916: vivekaḥ/ itthaṃ codāsīnacarvaṇena pratibandhakajñānanivṛttau niṣpratyūhaḥ pratibadhyacarvaṇodaya iti phalito 'rthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:918: aṅginy anyasminn aṅgayor vā na virodhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:921: pratyudgatā savinayaṃ sahasā sakhībhiḥ smeraiḥ smarasya sacivaiḥ sarasāvalokaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:922: mām adya mañjuracanair vacanaiś ca bāle hā leśato 'pi na kathaṃ vada satkaroṣi//
GK16jgrasg1u:923: iyaṃ ca puro nipatitāṃ pramītāṃ nāyikāṃ prati nāyakasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:925: aśrupātādibhir anubhāvair āvegaviṣādādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiś ca vyajyamānā nāyakagatā ratis tulyasāmagryabhivyakte prakṛtatvāt pradhānībhūte tadgata eva śoke prakarṣakatvād aṅgam/
GK16jgrasg1u:926: yadi tu nāyakagatā ratir nātra pratīyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:927: kiṃ tu niruktasāmagryā śoka eva prakṛtatvād ity āgṛhyate tadā nāyakālambanā pratyudgamādyanubhāvitā harṣādibhiḥ poṣitā nāyikāśrayā ratir eva tatrāṅgam astu/
GK16jgrasg1u:929: na ca nāyikāyā nāśāt tadgatāyā rater asaṃnidhānāt katham aṅgateti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:936: yāntīnāṃ gahaneṣu kaṇṭakacitāḥ ke ke na bhūmīruhāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:937: atra samāsoktyavayavābhyāṃ tarukāmikartṛkaripukāminīkabaryādigrahaṇarūpābhyāṃ prakṛtāprakṛtavyavahārābhyāṃ vyaktayoḥ karuṇaśṛṅgārayo rājaviṣayakaratibhāvāṅgatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:938: kiṃ ca prakṛtarasaparipuṣṭim icchatā virodhino 'pi rasasya bādhyatvena nibandhanaṃ kāryam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:939: tathā hi sati vairivijayakṛtā varṇyasya kāpi śobhā saṃpadyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:940: bādhyatvaṃ ca rasasya prabalair virodhino rasasyāṅgair vidyamāneṣv api svāṅgeṣu niṣpitteḥ pratibandhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:944: na ca virodhyaṅgābhivyatyā pratibandhān nābhivyaktir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:948: rasaniṣpatteḥ pratibandhas tv anubhavasiddha iti tāṃ praty eva virodhyaṅgānāṃ balavatām abhivyakteḥ pratibandhakatvaṃ nyāyyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:949: api ca yatra sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇamahimnā viruddhayor abhivyaktis tatrāpi virodho nivartate/
GK16jgrasg1u:953: ittham avirodhasaṃpādanenāpi nibadhyamāno raso rasaśabdena śṛṅgārādiśabdair vā nābhidhātum ucitaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:956: yatra vibhāvādibhir abhivyaktasya rasasya svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra ko doṣa iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:958: āsvādyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa pratyayājanakatayā rasasthale vācyavṛtteḥ kāpeyakalpatvena viśeṣadoṣatvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:960: evaṃ vibhāvānubhāvayor asamyakpratyaye vilambena pratyaye vā na rasāsvāda iti tayor doṣatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:961: samabalaprabalapratikūlarasāṅgānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tu prakṛtarasapoṣaprātīpikam iti doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:962: prabandhe prakṛtasya prasaṅgāntareṇa vicchinnasya punardīpane sāmājikānāṃ na sāmagryeṇa rasāsvāda iti vicchinnadīpanaṃ doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:965: yathā sandhyāvandanadevayajanādidharmavarṇane prasakte kayāpi kāminyā saha kasyacitkāmukasyānurāgavarṇane/
GK16jgrasg1u:966: yathā ca samupasthiteṣu mahāhavadurmadeṣu pratibhaṭeṣu marmabhindi vacanāny udgiratsu nāyakasya saṃdhyāvandanādivarṇane cety ubhayam anucitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:967: evam apradhānasya pratināyakāder nānāvidhānāṃ caritānām anekavidhāyāś ca saṃpado nāyakasambandhibhyas tebhyo nātiśayo varṇanīyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:968: yathā sati varṇayitumiṣṭo nāyakasyotkarṣo na siddhyet/
GK16jgrasg1u:970: na ca pratināyakotkarṣasya tadabhibhāvakanāyakotkarṣāṅgatvāt katham avarṇanīyatvam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:973: na ca pratipakṣasya prakṛtāpekṣayā varṇyamāno 'py utkarṣaḥ svāśrayahantṛtāmātrād eva prakṛtagatam utkarṣam atiśāyayet,
GK16jgrasg1u:975: evaṃ hi sati mahārājaṃ kam api viṣaśarakṣepamātreṇa vyāpāditavato varākasya śabarasyeva prakṛtasya nāyakasya na ko 'py utkarṣaḥ syād iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:976: tathā rasālambanāśrayayor anusaṃdhānam antarāntarā viratā na ced, doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:977: tadanusaṃdhānādhīnā hi rasapratipattidhārā tadananusaṃdhāne viratā syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:978: evaṃ prakṛtarasānupakārakasya vastuno varṇanam api prakṛtarasavirāmahetutvād doṣa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:981: tac ca jātideśakālavarṇāśramavayovasthāprakṛtivyavahārādeḥ prapañcajātasya tasya yasya yallokaśāstrasiddham ucitadravyaguṇakriyādi, tadbhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1000: tatra ratyādīnāṃ bhayātiriktasthāyibhāvānāṃ sarvatra samatve 'pi rateḥ saṃbhogarupāyā manuṣyeṣv ivottamadevatāsu sphuṭīkṛtasakalānubhāvavarṇanam
GK16jgrasg1u:1001: krodhasya ca lokabhasmīkaraṇapaṭor dinarātrivyatyayādyanekāścaryakāriṇo divyeṣv ivādivyeṣu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1003: na ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇād ārādhyatvajñānānutpattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1004: yatra sahṛdayānāṃ rasodbodhaḥ pramāṇasiddhas tatraiva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1006: jayadevādibhis tu gītagovindādiprabandheṣu sakalasahṛdayasaṃmato'yaṃ samayo madonmattamataṅgajair iva bhinna iti ca tannidarśanenedānīṃtanena tathā varṇayituṃ sāṃpratam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1007: tathā vidyāvayovarṇāśramatapobhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ svato 'pakṛṣṭeṣu na sabahumānena vacasā vyavahartavyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1009: tatrāpi tatrabhavan bhagavann ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanair munigurudevatāprabhṛtaya eva na rājādayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1017: yāvatā tv anaucityena rasasya puṣṭis tāvat tu na vāryate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1021: svalpaṃ jalpa bṛhaspate jaḍamate naiṣā sabhā vajriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1022: vīṇāṃ saṃhara nārada stutikathālāpair alaṃ tumburo
GK16jgrasg1u:1024: iti kasyacin nāṭakasya padye vipralambhaśṛṅgārāṅgībhūtavīrarasākṣepakaparamaiśvaryaparipoṣakatayā sthitadauvārikavacanasya brahmādyadhikṣepaparasyānaucityaṃ na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1025: evam eva “ale le saddaḥsamuppāḍia hariyakusaggaṃthimayācchamālāpai vittivissambhia bālavihavaṃdaḥkaaṇā bamhaṇā” ity ādividūṣakavacane 'pi reśabdādiprayogasya
GK16jgrasg1u:1029: raseṣu caiteṣu nigaditeṣu mādhuryaujaḥprasādākhyāṃs trīn guṇān āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1034: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇaśāntayos tābhyām api vipralambhe” ity apare/
GK16jgrasg1u:1035: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇavipralambhaśānteṣv atiśayitam eva na punas tatrāpi tāratamyam” ity anye/
GK16jgrasg1u:1036: tatra prathamacaramayor matayoḥ “karuṇe vipralambhe tacchānte cātiśayānvitam” iti prācāṃ sūtram anukūlam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1038: madhyasthe tu mate karuṇaśāntābhyāṃ vipralambhasya mādhuryātiśaye yadi sahṛdayānām anubhavo 'sti sākṣī tadā sa pramāṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1043: prasādas tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1044: guṇānāṃ caiṣāṃ drutidīptivikāsākhyās tisraś cittavṛttayaḥ krameṇa prayojyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1048: ojasvī bandha ity ādayo vyavahārā ākāro 'sya śūra ity ādivyavahāravad aupacārikā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1049: ye 'mī mādhuryaujaḥ prasādārasamātradharmatayoktās teṣāṃ rasadharmatve kiṃ mānam?
GK16jgrasg1u:1051: dāhādeḥ kāryād analagatasyoṣṇasparśasya yathā bhinnatayānubhavas tathā drutyādicittavṛttibhyo rasakāryebhyo 'nyeṣāṃ rasagataguṇānām ananubhavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1052: tādṛśaguṇaviśiṣṭarasānāṃ drutyādikāraṇatvāt kāraṇatāvacchedakatayā guṇānām anumānam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1055: prātisvikarūpeṇa kāraṇatvakalpanāpekṣayā laghubhūtam iti tu na vācyam/ pareṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:1056: madhuratarādiguṇānāṃ pṛthag drutataratvādi kāryatāratamyaprayojakatayābhyupagamena mādhuryavattvena kāraṇatāyā gaḍubhūtatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1062: atha śṛṅgāro madhura ity ādivyavahāraḥ katham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1064: prayojakatāsaṃbandhena drutyādikam eva vā mādhuryādikam astu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1068: tathā ca śabdārthayor api mādhuryāder īdṛśasya sattvād upacāro naiva kalpya iti tu mādṛśāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1077: śabdānāṃ bhinnānām apy ekatvapratibhānaprayojakaḥ saṃhitayaikajātīyavarṇavinyāsaviśeṣo gāḍhatvāparaparyāyaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1096: yadi komalatā tavāṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathāpi pallavānām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1100: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1112: udāharanti ca “svacaraṇaviniviṣṭair nūpurair nartakīnāṃ jhaṭiti raṇitam āsīt” ityādi/
GK16jgrasg1u:1113: tatra teṣām etādṛśīṃ vikaṭatvalakṣaṇām udāratām ojasy
GK16jgrasg1u:1114: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ katham anukūla iti ta eva jānanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1115: na hy atraujaso vaipulyena pratibhānam asti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1116: “viniviṣṭair nūpurair narta-” ity atra sannapy ojaso lavo na camatkārī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1117: nāpi tatra nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1125: yathā vā “ayaṃ patatu nirdayam” ityādiprāg udāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:1126: avidagdhavaidikādiprayogayogyānāṃ padānāṃ parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottaraśobhārūpam aujjvalyaṃ kāntiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1130: krama eva hi tayoḥ prasādād asya bhedakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1137: gaṅgety ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu varṇeṣu satsv api dīrghasamāsāntaḥpātitayāna tasya prarohaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1140: evaṃ kriyāparamparayā vidagdhaceṣṭitasya tadasphuṭatvasya tadupapādakayukteś ca sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1147: hariṃ sarvatra paśyāmi harer anyan na bhāti me//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1148: atra viṣṇur bhrātety ādinirmāṇe prakramabhaṅgātmakaṃ vaiṣamyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1149: ekasyā evokter bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ kathanātmakam uktivaicitryaṃ mādhuryam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1152: sukhaṃ śeṣe śetāṃ harir avīrataṃ nṛtyatu haraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1154: savitrī kāmānāṃ yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1155: atra vidhyādibhir nāsti kim api prayojanam ity eṣo 'rthaḥ samādhividhānādipreraṇārūpeṇoktivaicitryeṇābhihitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1159: “priyāmaraṇakātaraḥ” ity atra tu śokadāyino maraṇaśabdasya sattvāt pāruṣyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1166: “cumbanaṃ dehi me bhārye kāmacāṇḍālatṛptaye” ity ādigrāmyārthaparihāra udāratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1174: prauḍhir vyāsasamāsau ca sābhiprāyatvam asya ca// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1175: pūrvārdhapratipādyaṃ dvayaṃ vyāsasamāsau ceti catuṣprakārā prauḍhiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1176: sābhiprāyatvaṃ ceti pañcaprakāram oja ity arthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1187: atra “yasyāḥ parāṅganāgehāt patiḥ prātargṛhe 'ñcati” iti vākyārthe khaṇḍitāpadābhidhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1188: “ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaś ca na yacchati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1189: sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhir ucchṛṅkhalo nṛṇām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1190: atra daivādhīnaṃ sarvam ity ekasmin vākyārthe nānāvākyaracanātmako vyāsapadavācyo vistaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1197: “tataś ca mukto 'bhūd” iti vākyārthakalāpaḥ śatṛ-ktvā-bahuvrīhibhis tiṅantena cānuvādyavidheyabhāvenaikavākyārthīkṛtaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1203: pāpiṣṭhavāt karuṇāyā abhāve prakṛte 'syāḥ saṃpādanāya gaṇikety ādi sīdann iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1208: avarṇitapūrvo 'yam arthaḥ pūrvavarṇitacchāyo veti kaver ālocanaṃ samādhiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1212: apare tv eṣu guṇeṣu katipayān prāguktais tribhir guṇair vakṣyamāṇadoṣābhāvālaṃkāraiś ca gatārthayantaḥ kāṃścid vaicitryamātrarūpatayā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1213: kvacid doṣatayā ca manyamānā na tāvataḥ svīkurvanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1215: na ca śleṣodāratayoḥ sarvāṃśe gāḍhabandhātmanor ojovyañjakaghaṭanāntarbhāvo 'stu nāma,
GK16jgrasg1u:1217: gāḍhaśithilātmanor aṃśenaujovyañjakāntarbhāve 'py aṃśāntareṇa kutrāntarbhāva iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1220: evaṃ ca sarvatra vyañjake vyaṅgyaśabdaprayogo bhāktaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1225: kāvyaṃ tarhi sakhe sukhena kathaya tvaṃ saṃmukhe mādṛśāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1226: no ced duṣkṛtam ātmanā kṛtam iva svāntād bahir mā kṛthāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1227: atra pūrvārdhe tṛtīyacaraṇe ca lokottaranirmāṇapratipādake yo mārgo na sa caturthacaraṇe kadaryakāvyapratipādaka iti vaiṣamyam eva guṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1230: arthaguṇeṣv api-- śleṣaḥ ojasa ādyāś catvāro bhedāś ca uktivaicitryamātrarūpā iti na guṇāntarbhāvam arhanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1241: doṣāṇāṃ nirākaraṇena svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasya rasadhvanirasavadalaṃkārayoś ca svīkaraṇena ca gatārthāni /
GK16jgrasg1u:1242: samādhis tu kavigataḥ kāvyasya kāraṇaṃ na tu guṇaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1244: atas traya eva guṇā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1245: tatra ṭavargavarjitānāṃ vargāṇāṃ prathamatṛtīyaiḥ śarbhir antasthaiś ca ghaṭitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1246: naikaṭyena prayuktair anusvāraparasavarṇāiḥ śuddhānunāsikaiś ca śobhitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1247: vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca niṣiddhaiḥ saṃyogādyair acumbitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1254: anye tu vargasthānāṃ pañcānām apy aviśeṣeṇa mādhuryavyañjakatām āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1257: svānta me kalaya śāntaye ciraṃ naicikīnayanacumbitāṃ śriyam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1260: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1261: prathame padye 'tiśayoktyalaṃkṛtasya bhagavaddhyānautsukyasya bhagavadviṣayakarater vā dhvanyamānāyāḥ śānta eva paryavasānāt tadgatamādhuryasyābhivyañjikā
GK16jgrasg1u:1266: asmin patitāḥ prathamatṛtīyavargyā guṇasyāsya nānukūlā nāpi pratikūlāḥ saṃyogāghaṭakāś cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:1269: yathā-- “ayaṃ patatu nirdayaṃ dalitadṛpta-” ity ādau prāgudāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:1270: śrutamātrā vākyārtham karatalabadaram iva nivedayantī ghaṭanā prasādasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1272: udāharaṇāny atra prāyaśo madīyāni sarvāṇy eva padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:1275: prāṇeśaḥ praṇayākulaḥ punar asāv āstāṃ samastā kathā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1276: etat tvāṃ vinivedayāmi mama ceduktiṃ hitāṃ manyase
GK16jgrasg1u:1277: mugdhe mā kuru mānam ānanam idaṃ rākāpatir jeṣyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1278: atra sarvāvacchedena prasādābhivyañjakatvam aṃśabhedena tu mādhuryaujobhivyañjakatvam api,
GK16jgrasg1u:1279: manasijāntasya mā kurv ādeś ca mādhuryābhivyaktihetutvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1281: nanv atra śṛṅgārāśrayasya mādhuryasyābhivyaktaye tadanukūlās tu nāma racanā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1282: ojasas tu kaḥ prasaṅgo yad arthaṃ tadanukūlavarṇavinyāsa iti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:1283: nāyikāmānopaśāntaye kṛtānekayatnāyās tadīyaṃ hitam upadiśantyāḥ sakhyāḥ sakrodhatvasya vyañjanīyatayā tathāvinyāsasya sāphalyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1284: kiṃ bahunā rasasyaujasvino 'marṣāder bhāvasya cāvivakṣāyām api vaktari kruddhatayā prasiddhe vācye vā krūratare ākhyāyikādau prabandhe vā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1286: vācā nirmalayā sudhāmadhurayā yāṃ nātha śikṣāmadās
GK16jgrasg1u:1287: tāṃ svapne 'pi na saṃspṛśāmy aham ahaṃbhāvāvṛto nistrapaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1288: ity āgaḥśataśālinaṃ punar api svīyeṣu māṃ bibhratas
GK16jgrasg1u:1289: tvatto nāsti dayānidhir yadupate matto na mattaḥ paraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1291: tattadguṇavyañjanakṣamāyā nirmiteḥ paricayāya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca varjanīyaṃ kiṃcin nirūpyate-- varṇānāṃ svānantaryaṃ sakṛdekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1298: yathā-- “śuka karoṣi kathaṃ vijane rucim” ity ādau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1301: evaṃ svasamānavargyānantaryaṃ sakṛd ekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1306: yathā-- “atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā” ity ādau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1309: etac ca vargāṇāṃ prathamadvitīyayos tṛtīyacaturthayor ānantaryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1310: prathamatṛtīyayor dvitīyatṛtīyayor vānantaryaṃ tu tathā nāśrāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1312: etad apy asakṛc cet tato 'dhikatvāt sādhāraṇair api vedyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1322: “yathā yathā tāmarasāyatekṣaṇā mayā sarāgaṃ nitarāṃ niṣevitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1323: tathā tathā tattvakatheva sarvato vikṛṣya mām ekarasaṃ cakāra sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1328: idaṃ tu bodhyam-- gurur yayor vyavadhāyakas tayor eva varṇayor ānantaryakṛtam aśravyatvam apavadati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1332: “rāṣṭre tavoṣṭryaḥ paritaś caranti” ity evamādayaḥ śṛutikāṭavabhedā anye 'py anubhavānusāreṇa bodhyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1333: atha dīrghānantaryaṃ saṃyogasya bhinnapadagatasya sakṛd apy aśravyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1340: bhinnapadagatatvābhāvān madhuratvāc cānantaryaṃ na manāg apy aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1342: atra tām ity atra nīm ity atra ca parasavarṇasya pūrvapadabhaktatayā na saṃyogo bhinnapadagataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1343: pratyekaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñeti pakṣe 'pi bhinnapadagataḥ saṃyogo na dīrghād avyavahitaparaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1344: navāmbudety atra tv ekādeśasya padadvayabhaktatayā dīrghād bhinnapadagatatve saty
GK16jgrasg1u:1345: avyavahitottaratvaṃ yady api parasavarṇakṛtasaṃyogasya bhavati tathāpy atra bhinnapadagatatvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1348: yathā-- “eṣāṃ priyā me kva gatā trapākulā”/
GK16jgrasg1u:1349: idaṃ cāśravyatvaṃ kāvyasya paṅgutvam iva pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1350: atha svecchayā saṃdhyakaraṇaṃ sakṛd apy aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1354: evam eva ca ya-va-lopaprayuktam “apara iṣavaete kāminīnāṃ dṛgantāḥ”/
GK16jgrasg1u:1357: tārā iva turagā iva sukhalīnā mantriṇo bhavataḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1358: iti bhavadīyaṃ kāvyam iti ced akṛtvaiva yalopaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1360: evaṃ rorutvasya hali lopasya yaṇguṇavṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvarūpādīnāṃ naikaṭyena bāhulyam aśravyatāhetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1361: evam ime sarve 'py aśravyabhedāḥ kāvyasāmānye varjanīyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1363: tatra madhuraraseṣu ye viśeṣato varjanīyā anupadaṃ vakṣyante ta evaujasviṣv anukūlāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1364: ye cānukūlatayoktās te pratikūlā iti sāmānyato nirṇayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1371: sāyāhani praṇayino bhavanaṃ vrajantyāś ceto na kasya harate gatir aṅganāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1374: vedhā vidhāya punar uktam ivendubimbaṃ dūrīkaroti na kathaṃ viduṣāṃ vareṇyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1377: uttarārdhe kakāratakārarūpajhaydvayasaṃyogasya sattve 'pi prācuryābhāvān na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1380: ity ādi kriyate tadā sarvam eva ramaṇīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1386: “kalitakuliśaghātāẖ ke 'pi khelanti vātāḥ kuśalam iha kathaṃ vā jāyatāṃ jīvite me/
GK16jgrasg1u:1387: ayam api bata guñjannāli mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1389: yadi ca “kathaya katham ivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ” iti vidhīyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1393: capalopamitā khalu svayaṃ yā bata loke sukhasādhanaṃ kathaṃ sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1394: atra dvāv upadhmānīyāv eva na śāntānuguṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1396: “vacane tava yatra mādhurī sā hṛdi pūrṇā karuṇā ca komale 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1397: adhunā hariṇākṣi hā kathaṃ vā kaṭutā tatra kaṭhoratāvirāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1398: adhunā sakhi tatra hā kathaṃ vā gatir anyaiva vilokyate guṇānām” iti tv anuguṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1400: tulām anālokya nijām akharvaṃ gaurāṅgi garvaṃ na kadāpi kuryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1402: yadi tu “tulām anālokya mahītale 'smin” iti nirmīyate tathā sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1403: halāṃ la-ma-na-bhinnānāṃsvātmanā saṃyogasyāsakṛt prayogo yathā-- “vigaṇayya me nikāyyaṃ tām anuyāto 'si naiva tannyāyyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1404: ” la-ma-nānāṃ svātmanā saṃyogas tu na tathā pāruṣyam āvahati/yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:1405: “iyam ullasitā mukhasya śobhā pariphullaṃ nayanāmbujadvayaṃ te/
GK16jgrasg1u:1406: jaladālim ayaṃ jagadvitanvan kalitaḥ kvāpi kim āli nīlameghaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1408: “ā sāyaṃ salilabhare savitāram upāsya sādaraṃ tapasā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1409: adhunābjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasyāptā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1411: “sarasijakulena saṃprati bhāmini te mukhatulādhigatā” iti tu sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1413: ayi mandasmitamadhuraṃ vadanaṃ tanvaṅgi yadi manāk kuruṣe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1414: adhunaiva kalaya śamitaṃ rākāramaṇasya hanta sāmrājyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1417: tṛtīyasaṃyogasya cāsaṃbhavāt savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyoganiṣedho niravakāśa iti cet, na /
GK16jgrasg1u:1425: yaṅalugantāny anyāni ca śābdikapriyāṇy api madhurarase na prayuñjīta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1426: evaṃ vyaṅgyacarvaṇātiriktayojanāviśeṣāpekṣānāpātato 'dhikacamatkāriṇo 'nuprāsanicayān yamakādīṃś ca saṃbhavato 'pi kavir na nibadhnīyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1427: yato hi te rasacarvaṇāyām anantarbhavantaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayaṃ svābhimukhaṃ vidadhānā rasaparāṅmukhaṃ vidadhīran/
GK16jgrasg1u:1429: yato madhuratamatvenāsya nirmalasitānirmitapānakarasasyeva tanīyān api svātantryam āvahan padārthaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāruṃtudatayāna sarvathaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam arhati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1433: ye tu punar akliṣṭatayānunnataskandhatayā ca na pṛthag bhāvanām apekṣante,
GK16jgrasg1u:1434: kiṃ tu rasacarvaṇāyām eva susukhaṃ gocarīkartuṃ śakyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1438: āli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim/
GK16jgrasg1u:1439: prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudām udārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1440: ittham ete prasaṅgato madhurarasābhivyañjikāyāṃ racanāyāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā doṣāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1441: “ebhir viśeṣaviṣayaiḥ sāmānyair api ca dūṣaṇai rahitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1444: tāṃ vibudhā vaidarbhīṃ vadanti vṛttiṃ gṛhītaparipākām//
GK16jgrasg1u:1445: asyām udāhṛtāny eva kiyanty api padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:1449: vāme mānam apākaroṣi na manāg adyāpi roṣeṇa te
GK16jgrasg1u:1450: hā hā bālamṛṇālato 'py atitamāṃ tanvī tanus tāmyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1451: asyāś ca rīter nirmāṇe kavinā nitarām avahitena bhāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1455: nidrāvyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1457: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1458: atrotthāya kiṃcicchanair ity atra savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyogas tatrāpi naikaṭyeneti sutarām aśravyaḥ/ evaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1461: nirvarṇya patyur mukham ity atra ca rephaghaṭitasaṃyogasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1467: lokateś ca dhātor dviḥ prayogaḥ kaver nirmāṇasāmagrīdāridryaṃ prakāśayati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1475: dvārāntaranirapekṣatvena vyañjakatve viśeṣite tv asaṃbhavaḥ prasajyeta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1478: ata eva ca vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatvasyeva śabdabhinnatvasyāpi tadviśeṣaṇatve na nistāraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1480: na ca tatrāpi prānte raso 'bhivyajyata eveti vācyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1483: rasas tu tatra vyajyamāno 'py acamatkāritvān na dhvanivyapadeśahetur ity api na śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:1486: astu vā prādhānyena dhvanyamānasyāpi bhāvasya prānte rasābhivyañjakatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1490: bhāvādicarvaṇāyām atiprasaṅgavāraṇāya carvaṇāviṣayeti cittavṛttiviśeṣaṇam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1505: na tv ekasmin vyābhicāriṇi dhvanyamāne vyabhicāryantaraṃ vyañjakatayāvaśyam apekṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1507: vastutas tu prakaraṇādivaśāt prādhānyam anubhavati kasmiṃś cid bhāve tadīyasāmagrīvyaṅgyatvena nāntarīyakatayā tanimānam āvahato vyabhicāryantarasyāṅgatve 'pi na kṣatiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1513: ata eva nāntarīyakasya bhāvasya dhvananaṃ bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1517: yadi tu kvacit saṃbhavatas tadā na vāryete/
GK16jgrasg1u:1522: etena vātsalyākhyaṃ putrādyālambanaṃ rasāntaram iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1529: tathotpattiś ca putrāder vibhāvo yatra jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1531: aśrusvedādayaś cānubhāvā harṣaṃ tam ādiśet//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1534: avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1539: “tanmañju mandahasitaṃ śvasitāni tāni sā vai kalaṅkavidhurā madhurānanaśrīḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1540: adyāpi me hṛdayam unmadayanti hanta sāyaṃtanāmbujasahodaralocanāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1543: yady apy atrāsyā eva smṛteḥ saṃcāriṇyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1546: rasadhvanitvaṃ śakyate vaktum tathāpi smṛter evātra puraḥsphūrtikatvāc camatkāritvāc ca taddhvanitvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1548: tadāder buddhisthaprakārāvacchinne śaktir iti naye buddheḥ śakyatāvacchedakānugamakatayā na vācyatāsaṃsparśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1549: buddhisthatvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakam iti naye 'pi smṛtitvena smṛter vyaktivedyataiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1550: tasyāś cātra vākyavedyatve 'pi padasyaiva kurvadrūpatvāt padadhvaniviṣayatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1551: etena bhāvānāṃ padavyaṅgatve na vaicitryam iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1560: anyasya tu vyañjitasya bhāvatvam iti siddhāntāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1561: kiṃ tu vibhāva eva sundaratvāt kathaṃcid rasaparyavasāyī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1562: strīṇāṃ puruṣamukhāvalokanādeḥ puṃsāṃ ca pratijñābhaṅgaparābhavāder utpanno vaivarṇyādhomukhatvādikāraṇībhūtaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo vrīḍā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1573: “niruddhya yāntīṃ tarasā kapotīṃ kūjatkapotasya puro dadāne/
GK16jgrasg1u:1574: mayi smitārdraṃ vadanāravindaṃ sā mandamandaṃ namayāṃbabhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1575: pūrvatra trāsa ivātrāpi harṣo leśatayā sannapi vrīḍāyā anuguṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1582: āgatam api taṃ savidhe paricayahīneva vīkṣate bālā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1587: naivākarṣaty ambu naivāmbujāliṃ kāntāpetaḥ kṛtyaśūnyo gajendraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1590: “saṃtāpayāmi hṛdayaṃ dhāvaṃ dhāvaṃ dharātale kim aham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1595: nanu cottarārdhe cintā nāstīti vastuno 'bhivyakteḥ katham asya dhṛtibhāvadhvanitvam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1597: kim aniṣṭaṃ mama bhaviṣyatīty ākāraś cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śaṅkā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1599: “vidhivañcitayā mayā na yātaṃ sakhi saṃketaniketanaṃ priyasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1600: adhunā bata kiṃ vidhātukāmo mayi kāmo nṛpatiḥ punar na jāne//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1603: iyaṃ tu bhayādyutpādanena kampādikāriṇī, na tu cintā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1607: priyam āgatam api savidhe satkurute madhuravīkṣaṇair eva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1609: madhuravīkṣaṇair evety evakāreṇa bodhyamānā pratyudgamacaraṇanipatanāśleṣādīnāṃ nivṛttir anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1613: teṣāṃ mate cittavṛttyātmakeṣu bhāveṣu nāśarūpāyā glāneḥ kathaṃ samāveśa iti dhyeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1614: yady api “balasyāpacayo glānir ādhivyādhisamudbhavaḥ” iti lakṣaṇavākyād apacayaśabdena nāśa eva pratiyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1615: tathāpi prāg uktānupapattyā balanāśajanyaṃ duḥkham eva balāpacayaśabdena
GK16jgrasg1u:1620: adhunā mama kutra sā satī patitasyeva parā sarasvatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1622: atra sītāparityāgarūpo 'parādhas tajjanyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1629: atra hatakena mayā vivāsitā na tu vidhinety etasyārthasya patitopamayaiva paripoṣaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1631: yataḥ śūdrasya jātyaiva śrutidaurlabhyaṃ vidhinā kṛtam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1632: patitasya tu brāhmaṇāder vidhinā śrutisulabhatve svabhāvena kṛte 'pi tenaiva tathāvidhaṃ pāpam ācaratā svataḥ śrutir dūrīkṛteti tasya patitena
GK16jgrasg1u:1633: tasyāś ca śrutyety upamālaṃkāro dainyam evālaṃkurute/
GK16jgrasg1u:1634: tathā mayeti seti copādānalakṣaṇāmūladhvanibhyāṃ kṛtaghnatvakṛtajñātvanirdayatvadayāvatītvādyanekadharmaprakāśanadvārā tad eva paripoṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1641: adhṛtiś cānubhāvāḥ syuḥ sā cintā parikīrtitā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1642: vitarko 'syāḥ kṣaṇe pūrve pāścāttye vopajāyate//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1643: “dhyānaṃ cintā hitānāpteḥ saṃtāpādikarī matā/” iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1646: akṛtapratimā tanuḥ kṛtā vidhinā kasya kṛte mṛgīdṛśaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1650: kasya kṛtaity anirdhāritadharmyālambanāyāś cintāyā eva pratīyamānatayā sato 'py autsukyasyaitadvākyena prādhānyenā 'bodhanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1660: avyaktāsaṃgatavākyaiḥ sukumāraskhaladgatyā ca yo 'bhinīyate sa ādyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1664: “madhurataraṃ smayamānaḥ svasminn evālapañ śanaiḥ kim api/
GK16jgrasg1u:1668: atra mattasvabhāvavarṇanasya tanniṣṭhamadavyañjanārthatvān madabhāva eva pradhānam iti na svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasyaprādhānyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1671: “madhurasān madhuraṃ hi tavādharaṃ taruṇi madvadane viniveśaya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1672: mama gṛhāṇa kareṇa karāmbujaṃ papapatāmi hahā bhabhabhūtale//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1675: pūrvārdhagatā grāmyoktir uttarārdhe ca taruṇīkare 'mbujopameyatayā nirūpaṇīye svakarasya tadupameyatayā nirūpaṇaṃ ca madam eva poṣayataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1680: niḥśvāsairjṛmbhitair mandaiḥ pādotkṣepaiḥ śramo mataḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1682: ayaṃ ca saty api bale jāyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1688: cirāya citre likhiteva tanvī na spandituṃ mandam api kṣamāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1692: suṣuptau hi jñānarāhityenaiva yatnarāhityān mandam api spandituṃ na kṣamāsīd ity asyānatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1697: “ā mūlād ratnasānor malayavalayitād ā ca kūlāt payodher
GK16jgrasg1u:1698: yāvantaḥ santi kāvyapraṇayanapaṭavas te viśaṅkaṃ vadantu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1700: vācām ācāryatāyāḥ padam anubhavituṃ ko 'sti dhanyo madanyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1705: ayaṃ tu garvapradhāna iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1706: tathā hi vīrarasaprasaṅge prāg udāhṛte “yadi vakti-“ityādi padye gīṣpatināgirām adhidevatayāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:1707: sākam ahaṃ vadiṣyāmīti vacanenābhivyaktasyotsāhasya paripoṣakatayā sthitaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1709: na tu prakṛtapadya iva nāsty eva mahītale madanya iti sphuṭoditena solluṇṭhavacanenānubhāvena prādhānyena pratīyamānaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1714: bodhitāpi bubudhe madhūpair na prātar ānanajasaurabhalubdhaiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1720: “nikhilaṃ jagad eva naśvaraṃ punar asmin nitarāṃ kalevaram/
GK16jgrasg1u:1721: atha tasya kṛte kiyānayaṃ kriyate hanta mayā pariśramaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1732: iha tatprabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1734: “hṛdaye kṛtaśaivalānuṣaṅgā muhur aṅgāni yatas tataḥ kṣipantī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1735: tadudantapare mukhe sakhīnām atidīnām iyam ādadhāti dṛṣṭim//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1744: ārād upākarṇya giraṃ madīyāṃ saudāminīyāṃ suṣamā mayāsīt//
GK16jgrasg1u:1750: kuru kaśāṃ karābje karuṇāvati kampate mama svāntam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1751: khelan na jātu gopair amba vilambaṃ kariṣyāmi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1756: netranimīlanādayas tu nidrāyā evānubhāvā na tv asya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1758: yat tu prācīnaiḥ “asyānubhāvā nibhṛtagātranetranimīlanaṃ” ityādy uktaṃ tadanyathāsiddhānām api teṣām etadbhāvavyāpakatvād iti dhyeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1761: tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅ mayety anubhāṣiṇīm/
GK16jgrasg1u:1763: ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1764: eṣā pravāsagatasya svapne 'pi priyām evaṃbhāṣiṇīṃ dṛṣṭavato nidrāṃ prati kasyacid uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1765: yady apy evaṃbhūtāyāḥ priyatamāvasthāyā nivedanena nidre mama bhavatyā mahānupakāraḥ kṛta iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1768: na prānte tayor dhvananaṃ niroddhum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1770: nidrānāśaś ca tatpūrtisvapnāntabalavacchabdasparśādibhir jāyata iti ta evātra vibhāvāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1774: “nitarāṃ hitayādya nidrayā me bata yāme carame niveditāyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1775: sudṛśo vacanaṃ śṛṇomi yāvan mayi tāvat pracukopa vārivāhaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1778: kecid avidyādhvaṃsajanyam apy amum āmananti/ teṣāṃ mate--
GK16jgrasg1u:1782: na tu vārivāhaviṣayāyā asūyāyā evātra vākyārthateti śaṅkyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1783: vibodhapratītau hi satyāṃ tasminn anaucityāvagame saty anucitavibodhajanakatvena vārivāhe 'sūyāyā vilambena pratīteḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1786: yadi vārivāhe niṣkaruṇatvādibodhakaṃ kiṃcid api syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1789: astu vā svapnabhāvapraśamenāsūyayā ca sahāsya saṃkaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1792: nidrāṃ vihāya sa prātar āliliṅgātha cetanām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1794: yathā kaścit satyapratijño dvābhyāṃ nāyikābhyāṃ dvau kālāv upabhogārthaṃ dattvā yathocite kāla ekām upabhujya kālakantare pravṛtte tāṃ vihāyāparāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1795: tathaivāyaṃ rātrau nidrāṃ prātaś cetanām iti samāsokter eveha prakāśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1801: śoṇāgrābhyāṃ bhāminī locanābhyāṃ joṣaṃ joṣam joṣam evāvatasthe//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1804: nanu krodhāmarṣayoḥ sthāyisaṃcāriṇor bhāvayoḥ kiṃ bhedakam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1806: tatra tu gamakaṃ jhaṭiti paravināśādau pravṛttir vacanavaimukhyādikaṃ ceti kāryavailakṣaṇyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1807: vrīḍādibhir nimittair harṣādyanubhāvānāṃ gopanāya janito bhāvaviśeṣo 'vahittham//
GK16jgrasg1u:1819: adhikṣepāpamānādiprabhavā kim asya karomītyādyākārā cittavṛttir ugratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1822: vibhāvāḥ syur atho bandho vadhas tāḍanabhanabhartsane//
GK16jgrasg1u:1825: “avāpya bhaṅgaṃ khalu saṃgarāṅgaṇe nitāntam aṅgādhipater amaṅgalam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1826: paraprabhāvaṃ mama gāṇḍivaṃ dhanur vinindatas te hṛdayaṃ na kampate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1827: eṣā karṇena parābhūtaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ nindantaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati dhanaṃjayasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1830: na cāmarṣogratayor nāsti bheda iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1837: “akaruṇahṛdaya priyatama muñcāmi tvām itaḥ paraṃ nāham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1838: ity ālapati karāmbujam ādāyālījanasya vikalā sā//“ eṣā
GK16jgrasg1u:1839: pravāsagataṃ svanāyikāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantaṃ nāyakaṃ prati kasyāścit saṃdeśahāriṇyā uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1842: unmādasya vyādhāv antarbhāve saṃbhavaty api pṛthag upādānaṃ vyādhyantarāpekṣayā vaicitryaviśeṣasphoraṇāya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1844: na cātra prāṇaviyogātmakaṃ mukhyaṃ maraṇam ucitaṃ grahītum/
GK16jgrasg1u:1846: bhāveṣu ca sarveṣu kāryasahavartitayā śarīraprāṇasaṃyogasya hetutvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1849: adhunā khalu hanta sā kṛśāṅgī giram aṅgīkurute na bhāṣitāpi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1852: hantapadasyātrātyantam upakārakatvād vākyavyaṅgyo 'py ayaṃ bhāvaḥ padavyaṅgyatām āvahati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1853: etena bhāvasya padavyaṅgyatāyāṃ nātyantaṃ vaicitryam iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1854: dayitasya guṇān anusmarantīty anena vyajyamānaṃ “caramāvasthāyām api tasyā dayitaguṇavismaraṇaṃ nābhūd” iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1855: vipralambhasya śokasya vā caramam abhivyaktasya poṣakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1856: ayaṃ ca bhāvaḥ svavyañjakavākyottaravartinā vākyāntareṇa saṃdarbhaghaṭakena nāyikādeḥ pratyujjīvanavarṇane vipralambhasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1857: anyathā tu karuṇasya poṣaka iti vivekaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1858: kavayaḥ punar amuṃ prādhānyena na varṇayanti,
GK16jgrasg1u:1862: “yadi sā mithilendranandinī nitarām eva na vidyate bhuvi/
GK16jgrasg1u:1863: atha me katham asti jīvitaṃ na vinālambanam āśritasthitiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1865: bhuvi sītāsti na veti saṃdeho 'tra vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1869: kiṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ādy ākārāyāś cintāyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1870: idam itthaṃ bhavitum arhati prāyaśa ityākārasya vitarkasya viṣayavailakṣaṇyopalambhāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1875: duryodhanasya jīvita katham iva nādyāpi niryāsi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1879: asminn eva ca viṣādadhvanau duryodhanasyety arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyadhvanir anugrāhakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1890: ślathaya gatim ahaṃ no saṃgaraṃ draṣṭum īhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1895: leśatayā pratitau vā trāsa evānuguṇyaucityena dhvanivyapadeśāyogyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1909: darpadurvilasito daśānanaḥ kutra yāmi nikaṭe kulakṣayaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1913: na cātra cintā prādhānyena vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1914: kutra yāmīti sphuṭaṃ pratītena sthairyābhāvenodvegasyeva cintāyā apratyāyanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1915: paraṃ tv āvegacarvaṇāyāṃ tatparipoṣakatayā guṇatvena cintāpi viṣayībhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1917: iyaṃ ca mohāt pūrvataḥ parataś ca jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1922: sā pūrvaṃ parato vā syān mohād iti vidāṃ matam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1924: “yad avadhi dayito vilocanābhyāṃ sahacari daivavaśena dūrato 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1925: tad avadhi śithilīkṛto madīyair atha karaṇaiḥ praṇayo nijakriyāsu//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1927: karaṇaiś cakṣuḥśravaṇādibhiḥ kriyāsu tattatpramitiṣu praṇayasya śithilīkaraṇam anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1929: tu prakāraviśeṣavaiśiṣṭyena bāhulyenājananam iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1935: tena kāryākaraṇarūpasyānubhāvasya tulyatve 'pi glāner jaḍatāyāś cāsya bhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1938: rajanīṃ priyeṇa dūrād upayātena vibodhitā kathābhiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1939: adhikaṃ na hi pārayāmi vaktuṃ sakhi mā jalpa tavāyasī rasajñā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1940: eṣā hi priyāgamanadvitīyadivase muhurniśāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantīṃ sakhīṃ prati rajanijāgaraṇajanitālasyāyāḥ kasyāścid uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1943: jaḍatāyāṃ mohāt pūrvavartitvam uttaravartitvaṃ vā niyatam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1945: gopanīyaviṣayatvād yadi kathābhir ity avivakṣitavācyaṃ tadā śramo 'stu paripoṣakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1946: śramajanye hy ālasye śramasya poṣakatāyā avāryatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1947: atitṛptyādijanite tv ālasye śramād viviktaviṣayatvaṃ bodhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1951: “kutra śaivaṃ dhanur idaṃ kva cāyaṃ prākṛtaḥ śiśuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1953: eṣā bhagnaharakārmukasya bhagavato rāmasya parākramam asahamānānāṃ tatratyānāṃ rājñām uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1954: atra ca śrīmaddāśarathibalasya sarvotkṛṣṭatāyā darśanaṃ vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1957: maunaṃ muñcati kiṃ ca kairavakule kāme dhanur dhunvati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1959: dhātaḥ kiṃ nu vidhau vidhātum ucito dhārādharāḍambaraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1961: kavigatā vidhātrālambanāsūyā vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1964: nahi vidhātur aparādha iva bhagavato rāmasyāparādho 'sti yena kaver iva vīrāṇām apy amarṣo 'bhivyajyeta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1966: atrāprastutacandravṛttāntena prastutarājakumārādivṛttāntasya dhvananān nāsty asūyādhvanitvam iti tu na vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1969: teṣāṃ ca padadhvanibhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kutrāpi na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1971: vyādhitvenāsya kathane 'pi viśeṣākāreṇa punaḥ kathanaṃ bībhatsabhayānakayor asyaiva vyādher aṅgatvaṃ nānyasyeti sphoraṇāya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1981: iti yatra vibhāvāḥ syur anubhāvas tu bhartsanam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1987: ātmānaṃ hantum icchāmi yena tvam asi bhāvitaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1988: eṣā bhagavadanuraktivighaṭanopāyam apaśyataḥ prahlādaṃ prati hiraṇyakaśipor uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1991: na cāmarṣa evātra vyajyata iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1992: sadaiva bhagavadanurāgiṇi prahlāde hiraṇyakaśipor amarṣasya cirakālasaṃbhṛtatvenātmavadhecchāyā idaṃprathamatānupapatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1993: idaṃprathamakāryasya cedaṃprathamakāraṇaprayojyatayā prācīnacittavṛttivilakṣaṇāyā eva capalatākhyacittavṛtteḥ siddheḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1994: na cāmarṣaprakarṣa evātmavadhecchādikāraṇam abhivyajyatām iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1998: uttameṣu tv avajñādibhir janitā viṣayadveṣākhyā rodanadīrghaśvāsadīnamukhatādikāriṇī cittavṛttir nirvedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2000: “yadi lakṣmaṇa sā mṛgekṣaṇā na madīkṣāsaraṇiṃ sameṣyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:2001: amunā jaḍajīvitena me jagatā vā viphalena kiṃ phalam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:2010: api tu bhagavadaiśvaryam avāṅmanasagocara iti cet tathāpi tādṛśabhagavadaiśvaryavarṇanānubhāvitayā kavigatabhagavadālambanaratyā dhvanitvam akṣatam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:2012: “na dhanaṃ na ca rājyasaṃpadaṃ na hi vidyām idam ekam arthaye/
GK16jgrasg1u:2013: mayi dhehi manāg api prabho karuṇābhaṅgitaraṅgitāṃ dṛśam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:2014: atra dhanādyapekṣāśūnyasya bhagavaddṛgantapātābhilāṣo hi bhagavaty atyantānuraktiṃ vyanakti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2017: mātsaryodvegadambherṣyāvivekanirṇayaklaibyakṣamākutukotkaṇṭhāvinayasaṃśayadhārṣṭyādīnām api tatra tatra lakṣyeṣu darśanāt iti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:2029: cāpalād dhārṣṭyasya ca vastutaḥ sūkṣme bhede 'pi nāntarīyakatayā tadanatiriktasyaivādhyavasāyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2031: eṣu ca saṃcāribhāveṣu madhye kecana keṣāṃcana vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:2033: tathā hi-- īrṣyāyā nirvedaṃ prati vibhāvatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2039: vibhāvādāv anaucityaṃ punar lokānāṃ vyavahārato vijñeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2040: yatra teṣām ayuktam iti dhīr iti kecid āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2042: munipatnyādiviṣayakaratyādeḥ saṃgrahe 'pi bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca rater asaṃgrahāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2045: itthaṃ cānucitavibhāvālambanāyā bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca saṃgraha iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2066: na cātra cakitanayanām ity anena parapuruṣasparśatrāsābhivyaktyā rater anubhayaniṣṭhatety ābhāsatāhetur vācyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2067: asyāś ca cirāya tasminn āsaktāyā antaḥpure parapuruṣāgamanasyātyantam asaṃbhāvanayā ka eṣa māṃ bodhayatīty ādāv ucita eva trāsaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2068: anantaraṃ ca paricayābhivyaktyā so 'yaṃ matpriyo madarthaṃ prāṇān api tṛṇīkṛtyāgata iti jñānād utpannaṃ harṣam abhivyañjayat smeravadanām iti viśeṣaṇaṃ ratiṃ tadīyām api vyanakti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2069: paraṃ tu prādhānyaṃ nāyakaniṣṭhāyā eva rateḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2073: taruṇeṣu vilocanābjamālām atha bālā pathi pātayāṃbabhūva//
GK16jgrasg1u:2074: atra kutaś cid āgacchantyāḥ pathi tadīyarūpayauvanagṛhītamānasair yuvabhir anugamyamānāyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:2077: varṇanād abhivyajyamānā ratir bahuvacanena bahuviṣayā gamyata iti bhavaty ayam api rasābhāsaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:2081: atra rater navavadhvā manāg apy asparśād anubhayaniṣṭhatvenābhāsatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2093: paramākulatayā paramasaundaryaprayojyaṃ nakulasahadevayor autsukyaṃ ca vyañjayantībhir dṛgbhiḥ pāñcālyā bahuviṣayāyā rater abhivyañjanād rasābhāsa eveti navyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2094: prāñcas tv apariṇetṛbahunāyakaviṣayatve rater ābhāsatety āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2099: “vyatyastaṃ lapati kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇam atho maunaṃ samālambate
GK16jgrasg1u:2100: sarvasmin vidadhāti kiṃ ca viṣaye dṛṣṭi nirālambanām/
GK16jgrasg1u:2101: śvāsaṃ dīrgham urīkaroti na manāg aṅgeṣu dhatte dhṛtiṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:2103: atra sītālambaneyaṃ laṅkeśagatā vipralambharatir anubhayaniṣṭhatayā jagadgurupatnīviṣayakatayā cābhāsatāṃ gatā,
GK16jgrasg1u:2104: vyatyastaṃ lapatīty ādibhir uktibhir vyajyamānair unmādaśramamohacintāvyādhibhis tathaivābhāsatāṃ gataiḥ prādhānyena paripoṣyamāṇā dhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2105: evaṃ kalahaśīlakuputrādyālambanatayā vītarāgādiniṣṭhatayā ca varṇyamānaḥ śokaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2119: gurukule vidyābhyāsasamaye tadīyakanyālāvaṇyagṛhītamānasasyānyasya vā kasya cid apratiṣiddhagamanāṃ smarato deśāntaraṃ gatasyeyam uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2122: asyāṃ ca lokottaratvam abhivyajyamānaṃ vyatirekavapuḥsmṛtim eva puṣṇātīti saiva pradhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2123: evaṃ ca tyāgābhāvagataṃ sārvadikatvaṃ vyañjayanty adhidevatopamāpi/
GK16jgrasg1u:2125: yadi punar iyaṃ tatpariṇetur evoktis tadā bhāvadhvanir eva//
GK16jgrasg1u:2146: bhāvodaye vā pūrvaṃ bhāvaśānter āvaśyakatvān nānayor vivikto vyavahārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2161: bhāvānāṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvam āpannānām udāsīnānāṃ vā vyāmiśraṇam//
GK16jgrasg1u:2164: “pāpaṃ hanta mayā hatena vihitaṃ kītāpi yady āpitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:2165: sā mām indumukhī vinā bata vane kiṃ jīvitaṃ dhāsyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:2166: ālokeya kathaṃ mukhāni kṛtināṃ kiṃ te vadiṣyanti māṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:2167: rājyaṃ yātu rasātalaṃ punar idaṃ na prāṇituṃ kāmaye//“
GK16jgrasg1u:2169: yat tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkākāraiḥ “uttarottareṇa bhāvena pūrvapūrvabhāvopamardaḥ śabalatā” ity abhyadhītaya, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:2170: “paśyet kaścic cala capala re kā tvarāhaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:2173: svottaraviśeṣaguṇena jāyamānas tu nāśo na vyaṅgyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2178: atredaṃ bodhyam-- ya ete bhāvaśāntyudayasaṃdhiśabalatādhvanaya udāhṛtās te 'pi bhāvadhvanaya eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:2179: vidyamānatayā carvyamāṇeṣv ivotpattyavacchinnatvavinaśyadavasthatvasaṃdhīyamānatvaparasparasamānādhikaraṇatvaiḥ prakāraiś carvyamāṇeṣu bhāveṣv eva prādhānyasyaucityāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:2181: yady apy utpattivināśasaṃdhiśabalatānāṃ tatsaṃbandhināṃ bhāvānāṃ ca
GK16jgrasg1u:2182: samānāyāṃ carvaṇāviṣayatāyāṃ na prādhānyaṃ vinigantuṃ śakyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:2184: bhāvaśāntyādiṣv api teṣv eva śāntipratiyogitvādibhir vyajyamāneṣu tasyāḥ kalpayitum aucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2185: kiṃ ca yadi bhāvaśāntyādau bhāvo na pradhānam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2186: kiṃ tu tadupasarjanakaśāntyādir evety abhyupeyate tadā vyajyamānabhāveṣv abhihitatatpraśamādiṣu kāvyeṣu bhāvapraśamādidhvanitvaṃ na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2191: (nanu)udayasya vācyatve 'pi bhāvasyāvācyatvād dhanitvaṃ sustham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:2193: asmanmate tūtpatter vācyatve 'py utpattyavacchinnasyāmarṣasya pradhānasyāvācyatvād yukta eva bhāvodayadhvanivyapadeśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2194: evaṃ vyajyamānabhāvapratiyogikasya praśamasya vācyatve bhāvaśāntidhvanitvaṃ na syāt/ yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:2197: nanu śabdavācyānāṃ praśamādīnām aruṇakāntyaivānvayāt aruṇakāntipraśamāder eva vācyatvaṃ paryavasitam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2203: anyathā “sudṛśo nayanābjakoṇayoḥ” ity asyānvayo na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2205: “nirvāsayantīṃ dhṛtim aṅganānāṃ śobhāṃ harer eṇadṛśo dhayantyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2209: ubhayor apy avācyatvam apekṣitam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:2212: tasmād bhāvapraśamādiṣv api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāritvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2213: praśamādes tūpasarjanatvam ato na tasya vācyatādoṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2214: idaṃ punar bhāvadhvanibhyo bhāvaśāntyādidhvanīnāṃ camatkāravailakṣaṇye nidānam-- yad ekatra carvaṇāyāṃ bhāveṣu sthityavacchinnāmarṣāditvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2220: so 'yaṃ nigaditaḥ sarvo 'pi ratyādilakṣaṇo vyaṅgyaprapañcaḥ sphuṭe prakaraṇe jhagiti
GK16jgrasg1u:2221: pratiteṣu vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇaiva samayeta
GK16jgrasg1u:2222: pratīyata iti hetuhetumatoḥ paurvāparyakramasyālakṣaṇād alakṣyakramo vyapadiśyate /
GK16jgrasg1u:2224: unneyā vā vibhāvādayas tatra sāmagrīvilambādhīnaṃ camatkṛter māntharyam iti saṃlakṣyakramo 'py eṣa bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:2225: yathā-- “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ” iti prāg udāhṛte padye “saṃprati” ity etadarthāvagatir vilambena/
GK16jgrasg1u:2234: rasabhāvādir artho dhvanyamāna eva, na vācyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2235: tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ” iti cābhinavaguptapādācāryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2236: syād etat, yady ayaṃ rasādiḥ saṃlakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2238: “tenāyaṃ dvādaśātmakaḥ” iti mammaṭoktiś ca na saṃgaccheta,
GK16jgrasg1u:2240: tribhir upādhibhis traividhyam āpannena ṣaḍātmanā vastvalaṃkārayor iva rasāder apy
GK16jgrasg1u:2242: atrocyate-- prakaṭair vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhir alakṣyakramatayaiva vyajyamāno ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvo rasībhavati,
GK16jgrasg1u:2246: na rasāditvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na taduktīnāṃ virodhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2248: rasabhāvādir artha ity atra rasādiśabdo ratyādiparaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2249: taditthaṃ nirūpitasyāsya rasādidhvaniprapañcasya padavarṇaracanāvākyaprabandhaiḥ padaikadeśair avarṇātmakai rāgādibhiś cābhivyaktim āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2250: tatra vākyagatānāṃ padānāṃ sarveṣām api svārthopasthitidvārā vākyārthajñānopāyatve samāne 'pi kurvadrūpatayā camatkārāyogavyavacchinnatvena kasyacid eva dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2251: yathā “mandam ākṣipati” ity atra mandam ity asya/
GK16jgrasg1u:2252: racanāvarṇānāṃ tu padavākyāntargatatvena vyañjakatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭatvam eva na tu vyañjakatvam iti yady api suvacam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2254: racanāviśiṣṭapadavākyatvena vā vyañjakatvam iti vinigamanāviraheṇa ghaṭādau daṇḍacakrādeḥ kāraṇatvasyeva pratyekam eva vyañjakatāyāḥ siddhir iti prāñcaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2257: na hi guṇyabhivyañjanaṃ vinā guṇābhivyañjakatvaṃ nāstīty asti niyamaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2259: itthaṃ ca svasvavyañjakopanītānāṃ guṇināṃ guṇānām udāsīnānāṃ ca yathā parasparopaśleṣeṇaudāsīnyena
GK16jgrasg1u:2260: vā tattatpramitigocaratā tathā rasānāṃ tadguṇānāṃ cābhivyāktiviṣayateti tu navyāḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:2261: udāharaṇaṃ tu “tāṃ tamāla” ityādi prāg uktam eva vākyasya vyañjakatāyām api “āvirbhūtā yad avadhi” ityādi ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:2263: ratnāvalyādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjakatvān nidarśanāni prasiddhāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:2265: padaikadeśasya ca “nikhilam idaṃ jagad aṇḍakaṃ vahāmi” iti karūpataddhito vīrarasasya prāg evodāhṛtaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2266: evaṃ rāgādibhir api vyaṅgyatve sahṛdayahṛdayam eva pramāṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2267: evam eṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ prādhānyena nirūpitāny udāharaṇāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:2271: nāmani rasapadaṃ tu ratyādiparam ity eke/
GK16jgrasg1u:2273: kiṃ tu na dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam ity apare//
